1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra satwa nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ de pa la rdo rje sems dpa' 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor pa dbang rnam pa bzhi tshul bzhin du thob 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): cing / dam tshig rnams srog gi phyir yang mi gtong bas/ ri su la dang 
1b5(rgyud 'grel): brag phug dang / chu klung dang / dur khrod la sogs par gnas la/ nang 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ta s+ya d+ya byagyu/ bya 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): par dang por Da ma ru'i sgras ldang bar bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yas pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): snying gar bstan la/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM huM phaT/ oM grih+Na gri h+na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya huM huM 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn badz+ra bid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT/ de nas gdong bkru ba la sogs pas khrus 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas stan 'jam pa la 'dug la/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom par bya ste/ bde ba ma thob pa'i sems can
2a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bde ba dpag tu med pa la dgod par bya'o// de ltar gzhan gyi sems can thams cad gsal 
2a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems kyi snying rje bskyed par bya'o// de ltar gzhan gyi don bya ba'i sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i 
2a8(rgyud 'grel): bya tu rdzu tu bya nga rnar sna ba kyi 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bsgom par bya'o// phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa la btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// de nas rang gi bdag po'i sa bon las 'od byung nas nam mkhar 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la mchod 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o// smon pa'i sems kyis bdag he ru kar bsgyur la/ sems can thams cad he ru kar gyur cig ces pas smon lam bya'o// smon pa'i sems kyis de
2b3(rgyud 'grel): nas g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba'i chos thams cad gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i ngo bor rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgom mo/ sems brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM shu
2b4(rgyud 'grel): n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko he zhes brjod do// de nas bdag gi sdom pa dang // bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis bgegs bskrang bar bya ste/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ de'i steng du hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i ra ba dang bla bre dang phur bu rnams kyis phyogs bcing ngo // de nas 'jug pa'i sems kyis shin
2b6(rgyud 'grel): tu yang cha phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo mi dmigs so// a A i I u U e ai o au a aH/ a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya ha k+Sha hUM/ de dag gyur pa las hUM/ de chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya gru gsum rtseg mar 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ de'i dbus su shrI he ru ka/ bA rA hI dang gnyis su med par bsgom par bya ste/ dpal he ru ka zhal bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar
2b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yon ldang / dbus mthing nag/ rgyab ser ldang / zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum dang ldan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu bzung bas 'khyud pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na kha T+wAM ga g.yon gyi gnyis 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): pa na ka pA la bsnams pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa/ sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan pa/ zla ba phyed pa'i gzugs can/ spyi bor mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba se ral khar thogs pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ ska rags sil sil 'khrol ba/ spyi bor nor bu dang / rna cha dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): thal ba ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can/ yum bA rA hA ma de ga mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ gcer 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): buskra grol ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs can phyag gnyis na gri gug dang ka pA la thogs te/ gtso bo la 'khyud pa/ zhabs g.yon gyis 'khyud pa g.yas brkyang ba'o// brgya byin gyi phyogs kyi 'dab mar 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma/ nor bdag phyogs su lA ma/ chu bdag phyogs su dum skyes ma/ gshin rje'i phyogs su gzugs can ma/ lha mo de rnams kyang kha dog nag mo dang / ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / ljang gu'o// 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa/ phyag dang po na gri gug/ gnyis pa na thod pa/ g.yon pa na ka pA la/ gnyis pa na kha T+wA~M ga/ gcer bu srub shig pa/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma/ tshangs pa dang / biSh+Ta dang / 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin dang / srin po gdan du bting bas g.yon brkyang ba g.yas bskum pas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ thod pa se ral khar 'phyang ba'o// de rnams kyis rnam par dag pa ni/ he ru ki'i zhal 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni/ bde ba dang / shin tu bde ba dang / rnam par bde ba dang / bde ba chen po'o// yang rnam par thar pa bzhi ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi ste/ phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya'o// mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ la la nA dang / ra sa nA dang / a ba d+hU tI dang / dam rgya na'o// 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar ba'o// dpal he ru ka'i bzhugs gnas dbus kyi lte ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o// gru gsum gyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'o// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rtsibs 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa gnyis sems dang / mAM sa dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i dung chen po gnyis bzhag go// bdag nyid ni mgon po he ru ka ste byang chub sems kyi gzugs can no// de nas bdag gi ye shes sems/ 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bsgom mo// de nas DA ki la sogs pa'i rigs lnga sogs pa nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas bdag gi khar bzhugs te/ snying ga'i ye shes sems 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la thim ste/ gnyis su med par bsam mo// de nyid las he ru ka'i sku phra mo 'phros pas/ de rnams kyi dpal gyis reg pa'i sems can thams cad shrI he ru ka'i bdag nyid du bzhugs par 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ de nas go cha drug gi sa lus bsrung / oM ha badz+ra satwa/ na ma hi bi ro tsa ni swA hA/ swA hA hu pAd+mang+ga shwa ri/ bau Sha Ta he he ru ka/ hUM hUM ho badz+ra sAr+ya/ phaT haM a mo g+ha/ oM baM badz+ra bA rA hI/ 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): haM yo lA ma ni/ hrI mo ha ni/ hU~M trA~M Ta ra sI ni hUM hUM sany+tsa li ni/ phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka/ oM hrIHha he hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+re DA ki nI huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra lA me ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): khaN+Da ro ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rU pi NI huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bzlas pa'o// bde ba chen po'i gnas 'di la zhal cig la nyi ma phyed dam/ snga dro'am de'i phyed la sogs par bsgoms par bya'o// 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas ldang bar 'dod na gtor ma btang bar bya'o// oM a ra li ho/ badz+ra DA ki ni sa ma ya s+t+rI dre sh+ya ho// rdo rje snyim pa kha phye ste/ mtshan byed na gtor ma sbyin no// oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha/ 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha sa b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsen+ma da/ a basma ra/ badz+ra DA ka DA ki n+ya da ya/ i daM ba li/ grih+Na du sa ma ye rak+Shan+ta/ ma ma sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+na/ ya thaM baM ya thoSh+TaM/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi ba tha dzi gra tha/ mA ti 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba ka ri ta ya/ sa ta su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye/ sa ha yi ka b+ha ban+d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod la btang ngo // 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog nyid kyis// rnal 'byor me yi mkha' la byung // rtag tu 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bzang po yis// sbyor ba'i mchog ni bsgom par bya'o// 'dir ni rab tu gsang ba che// gzhan du bstan par mi bya ste// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba dang // mchog gis bsgom pa sbyar bar
4a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// rtag tu dam tshig srung bar bya// bza' dang bza' min gnyis mi bya// bgrod dang bgrod min mi bya ste// mthung dang 'thung min sbyor ba'i las// 'di ltar ye shes goms pa las// sngags pa 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub myur gu 'grub// bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed pa ni// rab tu gsang ba'i dngos grub ni// gzhan gyis gsol btab gsal bar bya// thams cad ma lus 'grub pa 'gyur// 'di byas bsod 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): nams gang thob pa// des na sems can ma lus pa// don rtogs stobs dang ye shes ni// bsam gyis mi khyab thob par shog/ bde mchog gi sgrub thabs// slob dpon chen po lnga yi pas 
4a8(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // bcom ldan phyogs kyi zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis// bcu gnyis phyag gis blang chen lpags sogs bsnams// bde gshegs drug 'gyur phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): phag mo sku brgyan bde ba mchog la rol// mkha' 'gro la sogs tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// mkha' 'gro sogs dang de bzhin sa 'og bcas// 'jig rten gsum mchog 'khor bcas bzhugs 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): su 'tshal// ye shes rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// thog ma med nas skye ba 'di bar du// shin tu mi bzang 'khor bar bdag 'khyams pas// bskal pa'i dus mtha' bstan pa'i snyigs 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): ma la// khyed kyi zhal gyi 'od zer glog tsam mthong // sngon gyi 'phro dang khyed kyi thugs rje yis// theg pa mchog gyur bla na med pa dang // gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i don chen 'di// blo ngan bdag
4b4(rgyud 'grel): gis spyad cing bsgrub pa'i phyir// bdag gis khas blangs dam bcas tshun chad du// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // dam tshig mi 'da' bde gshegs bka' mi bslu// mngon sum
4b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhin rtag tu khyed la dgongs// nyon mongs rang bzhin rnam shes ma sbyangs pa// khyed kyi sku gsung thugapa ni ma mthong yang // khyed kyi bka' las bdag ni mi 'da' na// bka' yi byin brlab pa dag
4b6(rgyud 'grel): la grub par mdzod// bdag gi rang bzhin khyed dang yongs su mnyam// ma lus 'gro tshogs rnams kyang de bzhin lags// bdag gis lus kyis nyes pa ci spyad par// sku'i dkyil 'khor tshegs la 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): bzod par gsol// bag med tshul gyis ngag gis nyes smras pa// rig sngags lha yi snying po phyag rgya dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su spyad pa las// nyams gyur gsung gi tshogs la bzod pa 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): gsol// bdag gi yid kyis gzhan gyis nyes bsams shing // ting 'dzin lta spyod lha dang slob dpon dang // rig sngags lha yi snying po'i phyag rgya dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par tsho gsal bzod par gsol// 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon brnyas shing bka' las 'das pa dang // spun la nyes smras byams pa chen po spangs// byang chub sems spangs theg pa gsum spangs dmod// skal min gsang bsgrags 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid phung po dmod// chos la yid gnyis sdug la chags bral byams// chos la gnyis 'byed dad pa'i sems la dmod// dam tshig ji bzhin bsnyad pa mi bsten dang / rtags pa'i rig ma smad
5a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa dang // rtsa ba 'di nyams khyed la bzod par gsol// dam tshig mi ldan rigs ma bsten par dga'// dkyil 'khor tshogs rtsod gsang ba'i chos ston dang // sems can
5a4(rgyud 'grel): dad la dam tshig gzhan du ston// nyan thos dag dang lhan cig gnas byed cing // sbyor ba ma byas snod min gsang ba ston// phyag rgya mi shes phyag rgya bsten pa dang // bsnyen pa dag par
5a5(rgyud 'grel): ma byas dkyil 'khor zhugs// sdom pa gnyis kyi bcad pa dgos med bzlas// yan lag dam tshig 'di las 'gal bgyis pa'i// bka' chad gnas su gyur pa ci mchis pa// bzod 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): par gsol lo tshangs par stsal du gsol// da lta'i dus su bstan pa 'jigs dus su// nyon mongs shas chen khyen gyis rab tu mkhyen// so sor thugs dam bzhin du nyer dgongs la// 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du phrin las mdzod// ji ltar bu yis rab tu mi shes kyang // pha yis brtse bas legs par skyong ba ltar// bdag gis gzhung 'di rab tu ma shes kyang // thugs rje chen pos 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gzung du gsol// dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags bsdus pa/ dpal ur+yan lha mo'i gnas pa/ rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+his mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// ma rgya nga ma #
5b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM ba ra gar+b+ha tat+tA sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang du thabs dang 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// kun rdzob don dam dbyer med rang bzhin can// bde dang stong pa 'dus pa'i ros gang ba'i// gnyug ma'i ye shes de la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig gom par gyur
5b3(rgyud 'grel): pas srid pa yis// brtson rar bkris pa'i 'ching ba kun gcod pa// sems kyi dam pa rang rig rin chen mchog/ gang la brten nas rtogs pa'i thabs bshad bya// drug dang brgyad gnyis bcu phrag 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang lnga// bzhin rgyas mig yangs gzugs mdzes lang tsho ldan// dad dang thos dang snying rjes yid brgyan ma// skyabs song sems bskyed yang dag dbang bskur ba// nyes bral dben par g.yed
5b5(rgyud 'grel): ba kun spangs te// khams dang rjes mthun bza' dang btung ba dang // dri zhim yid 'ong rgyan mdzes spyod dgu ldan// gang dang tha mal 'dzin pa rnams spangs te// dbang po'i gzhu ltar snang ba lha yi lus// 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): de la yi ge d+ya ni sna rtse dang // bya ni mtshan gyi lte bar rnam dgod cing // lte ba snying ga kha dang dpral ba ru// sngags kyi tshogs dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab// 'khyud dang 'o byed sen mo 'debs pa dang // 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): mchu 'jib pa dang nu ma 'tshir ba dang // nyed dang rdebs dang sor mo bskyod pa yis// dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba bya// gang tshe mnyam med rin chen mchog lta bu// sems kyi
5b8(rgyud 'grel): dam pa rang rig bde chen po/ gang du rtogs pa de tshe srog rtsol ba// bkag pa'i sbyor bas bde chen ro myang bya// dngos dang dngos med mtha' gnyis rnam spangs shing // stong dang snying rje dbyer med rang bzhin can// / 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu// rang rig bde chen ye shes gcig pu pa// gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gang der mtshon par bya// gang du mtshon cha mtshon byed kyis mtshon pa/ 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam shes ye shes nyid du mtshon pa dang // ye shes gang des shes byar snang ba yi// 'gro ba ma lus de kun der mtshon bya// de tshe dbang po'i yul du snang ba yang // gzugs sgra dri ro reg byar gyur pa yi// dngos
6a3(rgyud 'grel): po 'di kun ma lus bde chen po// gang du bde las gzhan pa'i dngos med cing // bde chen ye shes zhes bya gcig pu pa// gcig pu'i nyams kyis du mar gar mdzad do// gang gis rang gi ye shes mchog 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas// srid pa 'ching ba ma lus kun bcad de// bdag gzhan nye ba'i 'tsho ba'i 'byung gnas kyis// mnyam med mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la brten// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa// slob dpon chen po dzA lan d+ha ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin rnam dag gnyis kyi rgyu byas pas// brgyad po 'jig rten pa dang 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ste// lnga nyid spang bya lnga nyid lam yang yin// dag byed ngo bo sems kyi rang bzhin sku// bsam mi khyab pa'i rtog pa rang la byung // bzhi dang bral te gsum du rtag tu med// dag byed rang bzhin dag pa'i ngang 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): du snang // gnyis po spangs te lnga nyid la mdu bya// lnga la mi chags glang chen smyon pa 'dra// ku sha rlung ba spyod spyod 'di bdag lag ces// sha'u sar pa 'dra bar gso ba 'di// kun la gces pa yin zhes 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): ri khrod gsungs// ma rtogs rtogs pa'i spyod pa smyon pa 'dra// rtogs nas mi spyod blun po'i spyod pa yin// gang yang mi rtog de yi rang la bzhag/ grol bar 'gyur te de nyid the tshom med// gsum po spang 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis shing rang la ltos/ zhes gdams so// dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i man ngag/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba ri khrod pa chen po'i gsung / rje mi nyag lo tsa bas bsgyur ba rdzogs so// [ऽ]# 
6b2(rgyud 'grel): ga [।।ऽ।ऽ।]@#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI sa ha dza saM ba ra swa tiSh+Tha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba// he ru ka la phyag 'tshal 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): lo// kye ho sgrub pa'i snying po bde chen rang gi sems// 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rkyen dang bcas gyur kyang // rgya mtsho'i chu ni dngas ma'i rang bzhin yin// rnyog ma'i rang bzhin glo bur rkyen las byung / 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bcos rang sar bzhag na rgyal ba'i thugs// 'di na bla ma'i dus thabs bsten las byung ba ste// thabs kyi rgyal po bya ba thams cad gtang bar bya ba'o// zhes ri khrod pa chen pos gsungs so// phyag rgya chen 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i man ngag rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI sa ha dza saM ba ra swa tiSh+Tha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ bdag byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba// he ru 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste// byin gyis brlab dang rang rtags dang // rdzogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam med do// sna tshogs gzugs can yid du 'ong // yid 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu'i gzugs 'chang ma// zin na dngos grub chen po 'byung // chos bshad nas ni dbang du bya// yang na ri ba'i rin gyis blu// shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa po// dbang gis yongs su smin 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // lha ltar bltas la dngos grub blang // me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar// gsal la 'dzin med bde ba'i sku// nyi shu rtsa lnga yul rnams rdzogs// bltas dang rgod dang 'khrig pa yis/ 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' sbyor bde ba'i pho brang du// dbang gi rgyal pos gar byas pas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dgyes pa'i glu/ aM dang haM gis sgra brjod pas// 
7a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i ri bo rtse nas nyil// rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bltams pa dang // gnas pa bzhi yi rim pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur// dbang phyug dam pa'i gsang gtam 'dis// nam mkha'
7a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje grong du 'jug/ bde chen dag pa'i zhing khams mthong // thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i sku// shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med bde pa'i rnam pa can// ma ning zhes byar brjod pa
7a4(rgyud 'grel): ste// kha cig zung 'jug ces byar brjod// sgrib pa dang bral chos sku 'dir// rak+Sha la sogs byeng sems rnams// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di nyid do// 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i sbubs thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba// rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi 'bring pos mdzad pa/ rje mi nyag chen pos bsgyur ba rdzogs so// 5/ chol la #/ @#// rgya gar skad du 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): saM bar b+ha ga khA/ bod skad duM/ sdom pa bshad pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'brel las// bde mchog bshad pa 'byung ba ste// in+d+ra bo d+hi'i gzhung zhing 
7a7(rgyud 'grel): dang // kun spyod dA ri ka gzhung gis// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ru gsungs// dpal ldan 'bar ba 'dzin zhags sam// katsata yi gzhung rnams kyis// dpal 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): bo dang ninal 'byor ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis par grags// mkha' 'gro ma sogs dpa' 'dir dpyad par 'a bor bcas// sgo skyong ma dang yang dag ldan// khro bo'i gzugs ni hA dang bcas// zhal 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// lha mo rab tu gtum sogs bzhin// sku mdog sna tshogs khyad par ro// brtul bzhugs zhal snga nas kyis gzhung // phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa// sgeg 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs ro ni thams cad kyis// de rnams 'gying bas rol par 'gyur// yang na sems ni rnam dag pa// sku mdog sngon po rnam pa'i dbyibs// dpa' bo lha mor yang dag ldan// kha cig gi/ 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhung du brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha dog gsum du yang dag gnas// gang phyir 'khor lo gsum gsungs pa// de phyir kha dog gsum du 'gyur// 'di rnams nang nas 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod pa// de kun rnal 'byor pas gus bya// phyag gnyis la sogs brtsams nas ni// ji srid phyag ni 'bum de bzhin// phyag dang zhal ni grub phyir min// bsam yas sbyor bas
7b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// de ltar blo bzang shes nas ni// gnyis med ye shes bsgom par bya// dad pa tsam gyis 'jug bya ba// dpyad pa nyid du sbyar mi bya// mchog tu dga' bas 'di dag kun// gang 
7b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms 'bras bu mchog phan te// lhan cig skyes par thim pa yis// he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom// bla ma'i bka' lung blangs nas ni// dang por gus pa'i sems kyis su// brtan pa'i sems 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgom byed na// dam pa'i phun tshogs thob par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar sdom par min// slob dpon kha cig smra bar byed// he ru ka 'byung rgyud gsungs yin// bde mchog nyid du ma 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): yin pas// de phyir bdag gis ma bris te// dpal ldan rdo rjes bzod pa mdzod// man ngag gis ni phag mo yis// rgyud du nges par rab tu grags// 'bar ba yi ni phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor dgus 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dor dang ni// bde mchog gtor ma'i las rnams kyang // he ru ka ni 'byung chud du// he ru ka phyag la gnas pa// he ru ka'i rgyud du gsungs// na bza' dag gi khyad par ni// stag gi 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): pags pa bsnams pa te// bdag gis tha mas gsungs pa yang // lhan cig skyes pas smad dkris na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi ni gzugs// rtag tu ngu ba mchog gi mchog/ dkar ba dang ni khrag 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): gi mdog/ khams drug gis ni bsdus pa yis// kha dog la sogs mtshungs pa'i gzugs// dang po nyi ma lta bu'i zhal// lha mo sgra ni grol ba nyid// gzhung ni 'di gnyis bgros nas ni// snying 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): ga rA ni bsgom bya zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa'i de nyid bya// gzhan yang khrag gi rtsa rgyud du// shin tu dmar bar 'bab pa yang // bud med me tog g.yas nas so// g.yon du khu ba 'bab pa ni// 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): chu yi rgya mtsho lta bu ste// de ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin no// rkang dang rus partsa rgyud rlung // lnga pa khu ba dang ldan pa// pa las gyur pa 'di rnams yin// ma yi sha lpags khrag dang ni// chu dang ma 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa nyid// de nyid kyis ni gang grub pa// 'di ni mgon po he ru ka/ bskyod dang skyed par byed pa po// pha ma gnyis ni dbyer med pas// dpal ldan bde mchog bshad pa 'di// yon tan 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis gter gyur pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no// de ltar shes nas de yis gzugs// srid gsum bde ba ster ba ni// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgoms// sgra yi tshul la nges 'byung ba// 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs gang 'dod de// de don bdag gis bshad par bya// 'jug pa yi yang mtshan nyid ni// rab tu 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor sogs// phyi rol rnams cig mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas
8b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis rang bzhin te// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// ldog pa bdag gis brjod par bya// 'khor lo sdom par yang dag gnas// lhan cig skyes pa rnams kyi gzugs/ 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): de ni snying gar rtag tu gnas// phyi rol nang du mnyam pa nid// dkyil 'khor gyi yang sems kyis ni// rnam par dgod pa bshad nas so// de ni lus gnas bshad par bya// he ru ka ye rol 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): par brjod// rnam dag dang ni he ru ka/ yan lag dag dang nying lag dang // lhan cig skyes pas mnyam gzhag pas// phyis ni rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom// go rim bzhin du lus skyes ni// 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phur bu lhan cig skyes// bcings pa thig sang rab tu ldan// shin tu mtshams med bstan par bcings// gur ni rus pa'i phreng ba nyid// mchod pa'i cho ga khyad par bzung // yan lag 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas brgyan pa dang // go cha mtshams med bcings pa ni// de ni go cha chen por ldan// gang zhig mi dmigs pa yi rtsa// sems can kun la phan mdzad ma// lha dang lha min rnams la/ 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag thams cad de yis khyab// rkang pa'i mthil du rtsom pa'i rlung // yang dag gnas shing lter son par// me yi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid 'bar// lto bar ches ni dka' ba yis// mu ni mdzes pa 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi gzugs// thang du yang ni dbang chen ni// kha dog ser pos rnam par spras// mgrin pa'i steng du brtan pa yi// rtse brgyad ldan pa'i ri rab bo// bdun ldan nyi ma A li thA// nang du 'gro dang 'ong 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // chu skyes 'dab ma sum cu drug/ ldan par rdo rje'i dbus son par// A li kA li las byung grub// mdzes pa'i spyi bor hUM byas te// der gnas gser gyi gnas su ni// sna tshogs dbus 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): su dang po'i ming // zhes bya lhan cig skyes pa yang // dri med zla ba'i gzi brjid nyid// yan lag kun gyi mtshams su ni// rim gyi 'gro bar byed pad+ma// sna rtse dbus kyi gnas su yang // 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pas skyes par byed pa ni// sum cu rtsa drug ror ldan pa'i// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsa rnams kyis// spyi skyes thog ma med pa yi// sangs rgyas nyid ni bskur bar bya// mkha' 'gro bya bzhin rnam dag 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): khams// mkha' 'gro ma yis dra ba zhes// 'di yi don ni yang dag grags// rgya mtsho shin tu sna tshogs pa'i// 'gram dang ri yi dbang por ldan// zab mo sna tshogs snying po yang // gdod nas 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i dur khrod nyid// rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // dril bu do shal shin tu mdzes// gsum gyi bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor nyid// srad bu mchog gis shin tu spras// 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): rnga yab kyis ni g.yob pa dang // so phag rnam par dag pa yi// rdul mtshon dri ma med pa dang // bum pa la sogs gzhag pa dang // de byung ldan par gang bas ni// lhan cig skyes gnas bris par bya// 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): thal ba ro bsregs las byung ba// pad gnas khro ba med pa yis// sbyor ba'i ye shes shin tu mdzes// phag mo gnyis su med pa'i gzugs// he ru ka de sems su brjod// rgyu lnga zhes bya'i rig/ 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod// der gnas sa bon rdzogs pa ni// de ne he rA ka dpal brjod// gnyis med don gyis shI yi sgra// he ni rgyu ni rnams spangs pa// ru yi gzugs ni 'jigs 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dkar zhing dmar ba'i rang bzhin can// shI ni yang dag bshad pa ni// thams cad bskyed par byed pa'i rgyu// shI ni mtsho'i 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): skad kyis ni// b+ha ga'i don du mngon par brjod// sems ni he ru ka nyid de// dpal he ru kar rab tu bsgrags// b+ha ga'i sgra ni ngag lam 'das// rA ni dri ma rnam par spangs// hI ni rgyu ni rnam 'jig pa/ 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): phag mo'i sgrar ni rab tu grags// skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir// ral pa'i rtsa ba zhes byar bshad// sna tshogs sems can don byed phyir// sna tshogs rdo rjer rnam par gnas// byang chub sems ni zla bar 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// dpal ldan bde chen 'khor lor gnas// der gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa ni// rdo rje pad+mar yang dag gnas// cha kun du ni yongs gang bas// rgya mtsho yi ni lam rnams su// 'dzag pa
9b4(rgyud 'grel): yi ni lam pa ste// lte ba'i 'gram gnas bdud rtsi ni// sngar gsungs rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams skyes// stong pa'i rnam par sbyor ba las// lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// rang bzhin gcig pas dag pa ni// / 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dag pas sdig par byed// byang chub sems byung thal ba yis// yan lag kun la rnam par gnas// thal ba'i dag par rtag tu brjod// phyi rol nang du yongs dag gnas// yan lag bcu gnyis las 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): byung phyir// phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan// zhal bzhi yang dag gsungs pa ni// rnam thar bzhi ni dag pa'o// lha mo gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma// dum skyes ma dang lA ma nyid// grub pa'i rnal 'byor
9b7(rgyud 'grel): ma rnam bzhi// rgyu dang mi rgyu skyong bar mdzad// gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang tshe dbang sogs 'thung ba ni// de tshe bza' ba zhes byar brjod// phyag rnams nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// ce
9b8(rgyud 'grel): gsum sku gsum dag pa'i phyir// glang po gti mug rnam par 'jig/ lus ngag yid gsum dang byung ba'i// skyon ni dgra stas gcod par byed// gri gug rnon pos sems can don// brtson 'grus 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan phyir 'phyar// rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis// sgra ni cang ter brtag par bya// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas// rdo rje stong pa'i sems bsregs pa// byang chub sems 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin gyi// kha T+wAM ga ni yan lag gnas// thod 'gro skyong bzod pa'i sku// des na de ni thod par brjod// snying rje ro yis gang ba ni// 'thungs pa he ru ka nyid rgyal// zhags pas skyon ni rnam par 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings// lus can mi lus gzhan yang 'gyur// mgo bo tshangs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// dril bu shes rab rang bzhin byer// yig 'bru lnga bcu'i mgo bo rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par// / 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// mgul gyi nor bu phreng ba'i rgyan// grub pa'i gnas ni kun gyi bdag/ mche ba bzhi dang rab ldan pas// bdud bzhi rnam par dral bar mdzad// tshems phreng rtag tu gnyis med pa// 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): me stag tshegs dang yang dag ldan// pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pa// phyag rgya drug gis legs par brgyan// nam mkha'i gos kyi rang bzhin gyis// stag gi lpags pa cha med par// kun gyi 'gro 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad ni// stong pa'i sbyor bas g.yas brkyang ba// he ru ka'i khyad par las// des na g.yas brkyang ba zhes bshad// g.yon pa'i yan lag bskum pa zhes// tshig tu brjod pas 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba// mtshan nyid yang dag thob pa yin// dpal ldan he ru ka 'byung ba// 'khor lo tshogs ni kun tu'o// slob dpon gzhan gyi lugs dag gis// g.yas pa'i zhabs ni bskum 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod// blo bzang kha cig gar yang byed// gnyis ka 'dod pa ma yin te// g.yon na g.yon pa skye bos mdzes// don mchog thams cad sbyin par nus// g.yon gyis rtag tu rnal 'byor 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// gnod pa kun las 'jigs rgyal byed// gang phyir sdom pa gtso bor yis// nges par thams cad g.yon las 'byung // de phyir tshogs nus pa kun// las ni g.yon pas rtag tu bya// 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dang sems min 'gog pa'i lam// mtsho skyes su ni bus gang mtsho// rdo rje mthar ni rnam 'byung ba'i// ro mnyam rtse gcig de yin te// phag mo sbyor mchog skyes 'dzin rig/ gang phyir gcu 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): bor gnas pa ni// lha mo mchog gnas sdom pa ste// de byir g.yon pa'i cho gas brgyan// nyi zla rnam dag srid las skyes// rang bzhin gyis ni ro mnyam de// pad+ma mchog gi gnas su 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): ltung // ri ste sa rang byung yang dag ldan// De ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya// sangs rgyas khams su rab tu brtags// nam mkha' kun turgyu grub pas// mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya bar brjod// de la 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa gzugs ji bzhin// gzugs can ma zhes mngon par brjod// gzugs las rim pas skyes pa nyid// mtshon par yang ni dum skyes ma// gang yang mdzes pas yongs gang ba// skyes 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): popa bud med las byung ba// mtshan ma kun gyi yongs su rdzogs// des na lA mar rab tu grags// nga rgyal la sogs kun bral ba// des na bla re ru ni grags// pad+ma chos kyi dbyings yin te// de ni 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas// 'dod chags skyon dang bral ba ni// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs dang ldan pas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// de ni dpa' bo zhes byar brjod// de nas thams cad
10b8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag thob// stong pa nyid rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig skyes dga'i ngo bo gang // de ni dpa' mo'i dbang phyug yin// 'di ni dga' ba'i brjod med pa// 'khor lo sdom pa sde mtshan mtha'
11a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu kha ni 'og gis ni// yan lag kun gyi yid 'phrog 'dzag/ 'dod chags la sogs rtsa dang mtshungs// ye shes srin bus zos pa ni// mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyis// 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob tu ni de myong ngo // nam mkha' pad+ma'i mkha' dbus su// mkha' spyod du ni bgo bar 'dod// der gnas shin tu rnam spros pa// mkha' spyod 'khor los yang dag bshad// sa zhes
11a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba rab tu gnas// lte ba'i pad+mar skye dang 'chi// der gnas shin tu legs par bya// sa spyod 'khor lor yang dag bshad// sa 'og zhes ni gang gsungs pa// pad+mar byang chub sems 
11a4(rgyud 'grel): lhung ba// dri med yid kyi pha rol tu// sa yi 'og tu gnas pa'i sems// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yis// he ru ka yi rnam par gnas// A li kA li mnyam ldan pa// lhan cig 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): myos pa'i dga' bas mdzes// A dpe gzhan na a bya 'dug brtago/ khya sprul pa'i 'khor lor ni// pad+ma'i nang du dag gnas// lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa ste// 'jig rten gsum gyis
11a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par brjod// oM hri hri kham pad+ma phyogs phyogs 'dab ma la// laM maM baM ti mtshams cha la// dbus su he ru ka sa bon// lte ba mchog tu pad rang gnas// chos kyi lte ba pad chen por// 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba gnas// der gnas rtag tu mdzag pa ste// 'dod pa'i don kun grub par byed// de ster longs spyod 'khor lo la// oM gyi yi ges mtshan pa yis// kha ni rtag tu 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): gyen du blta// a i lhan cig u e ni// rnal 'byor ma mchog dpa' bor ldan// de steng mgrin pa'i gnas su ni// de ru mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa// der ni rtag tu gnas pa yi// mchog/ 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): tu dga' ba nyid du 'dod// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor hUM// zla ba'i 'od zer ltar 'dzag 'dod// der ni 'gro dang 'ong bar ni// mig gis kyang ni mthong mi 'gyur// myur ba steng du rnam par bshad// / 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): drangs pa ngos su rnam par gnas// 'ching ba dbus su yang dag gnas// dal brtag tu rab tu grags// rgyu mthun dang ni rnam smin dang // skyes bu de bzhin mtshan nyid med// 'dir ni 'bras bu 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhi// dga' ba rnams su rab tu grags// chung ngu 'bring dang chen po dang // chen po las kyang chen po ste// sems kyi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// mi la sogs pa rnam par 'khrul// lus la
11b4(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni// nges par lte ba las skyes te// de ni sna tshogs skad cig bshad// chos kyi rang bzhin skye ba ni// rtag tu sdug bsngal zhi ba'o// rnam par smin nyid snying ga las// rtag pa ru 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): ni skyong bar byed// longs spyod ces ni bya ba la// du ma rnams kyi cha shes bya// de ni rnam nyed rang bzhin no// spyi bor shes dang shes bya gnas// yid la rnam par spangs pa ste// de ni mtshan nyid bral 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin// lhan cig skyes sogs dga' ba bzhi// lhan cig skad cig dag las skyes// 'khor lor gtso bor skad cig ni// gzhan yang dga' ba'i mtshan nyid ni// phreng ba tsan dan bud med sogs// 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe mthong bas bde 'dzin pa// de tshe dga' bar yang dag bshad// sems can kun la yang dag gnas// rdo rje pad+mar mnyam sbyor bas// ji ltar sems ni rnam par gnas// de yi sems gang
11b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa ni// de tshe mchog tu dga' bar brjod// sbyor ba las ni dga' bral sems// bde ba'i mthar ni yang dag nas// de ni dga' bral zhes byar gsungs// skye dang 'jig pa rab tu grags// 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // dga' bral dang ni rnam gsum mo// lhan cig skyes pa rang bzhin 'di// brtan g.yo kun sogs rang bzhin te// lhan cig skyes pas thams cad 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): gang // bsam yas su ni rgyal bas gsungs// gang phyir brjod med kun 'gro ba// ye shes he ru ka ru brjod// shes rab gzhan gyi gnas su brjod// gang gi gnas 'di thabs gnyis de// 'di 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): dag gnyis su med pas ni// sbyor ba'i gnas su gnas pa yin// de las byung ba de nyid gnas// de dang bral bar gang gnas pa// lhan cig skyes zhes yang dag brjod// ngag gi lam 'das spyod/ 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): yul nyid// bdag gi de nyid rtag sngags dang // dkyil 'khor de nyid yang dag ldan// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa 'di// 'di yi sku la rnam par gnas// dmigs pa las ni sangs rgyas yin// dmigs 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa rdo rje 'dzin// gnas gnyis dag tu ma brten par// shes rab gnyis med nye bar gsungs// gnas bcu la sogs dag ni// pha rol tu phyin mchog bcu po de// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis// thams 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): cad lus la rnam par gnas// 'di rnams rim pa ji lta bar// spyi bo spyi btsug la sogs dang // ji srid pus mo gnyis dag tu// 'di rnams kyi ni gnas dag tu// dpa' bo la sogs blta bar bya// 
12a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa dang ni gnas pa dang // rab tu thim pa zhes bya ba// bu li ra ni bdag po ste// 'bar ba 'dzin par longs spyod gnas// ur+yan du ni thim par gsungs// gnas sogs zhing dang
12a8(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod du// yan lag kun la thim par 'gyur// sdom pa zhes bya'i mtshan nyid do// sprul pa yis ni gang du skyes// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu yi gnas// chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin gyis// / 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): thim par gyur par the tshom med// de ltar skra yi cha rnams kyis// dbang dang longs spyod dag dang thim// ji ltar gnas su de bzhin du// dga' ba rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// skye ba dang ni gnas pa/ 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // rim pa yis ni rab thim 'gyur// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bskul bas// gnas kyi sgo nas dbye bar bya// dpal ldan 'bar 'dzin bu gar ni// de yi skad cig bdo 'byung bas// bde
12b3(rgyud 'grel): bas thig le bye 'gyur zhing // thig le brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag/ de ni phag po de sangs m+b+has// dpa' bo gnyis med ldan pa yin// phung sogs sangs rgyas de rnams dang // khams kyi'ang 'brung 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): khungs rnam par brjod// bud med skyes pa gnyis su brtags// lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// thams cad yul du brjod pa ni// nam mkhar thim pas bdud rtsir 'gyur// de la gang dag 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa ni// thabs nad mkha' la spyod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro kun gyi dra ba yis// bde bdag gi snying po'o// 'dir ni phreng med sngags bzlas med// lhan cig skyes pas thams cad gnas// 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): de phyir rnam rtog med pa yis// 'bad pas gus pa bskyed par bya// 'jigs dang ngo tsha rtag tu spangs// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya// 'di ldan bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dang // chos sbyin 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan dkyil 'khor sogs// bum pa rdul tshon thig cho ga/ lus la lhan cig skyes grub pas// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las// ye shes me ni shan tu 'bar// las kyi rlung 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): gis bskul nas ni// lte ba'i pad+mar rnam par gnas// du ba thul ba 'bar ba dang // lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gsal// ye shes 'khor lor son pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs nas ni// 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor bzhugs// thabs la mchod pa byas nas ni// mdzod spur yid ni zhugs gyur pas// ur+yan zhes ni bya ba yi// gnad kyi sgo nas 'thon nas 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang // dzA lan d+ha rar rab tu zhugs// bde gshegs thams cad bsregs na san// lha mo yid kyi shugs ldan ni// dmigs kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad bskul nas ni// 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi phung por byas nas kyang // 'o ma'i rgyun ltar 'dzag par 'gyur// gser gyi sgor ni zhugs par 'gyur// longs spyod 'khor lor gnas nas kyang // so yi bu kar 'dzag par 'gyur// 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): chan brgyad mo lta bu ni// sems kyi ngo bor ngal ba so nas// rgyun mi 'chad par bsregs nas kyang // rgyal ba rnams ni mnyes par byed// yang dag las ni rab tu 'byung // lte ba'i pad+mar yang dag 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// kun nas yang ni 'gro ba dang // de bzhin du na rgyun 'o nyid// mkha' 'gro rtsa ni kun spyod ni// bde chen 'khor lor bshad pa'o// // sdom pa bshad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): po brtu la zhugs kyi spyod pa la zhugs pa nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// dza go ta lar 'od sngon chos 'byung gis bsgyur ba'o// 5 sa la so// // rgya gar skad du/ sap+ta a k+Sha ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// byis pa bud med phal char ni// rgyas par gzung dkar 'gyur bas na// mdor bsdus pa'i yang mdor bsdus nas// yi 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): ge bdun pa bsdu bar bya// mchod sogs stong nyid byang chub kyi// sngags kyi mthar thug 'og tu ni// brtser ldan lus kyi dbus son pa'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub bya// yaM raM baM laM byung ba bzhi'i// 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor steng du sum las byung // lhun po rin chen sna bdun dang // rtse mo brgyad pa ba sa ma par bya// oM me di ni ba dz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM// oM badz+ra prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM baM hUM 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra pi tA na hUM khang hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ra dz+wa la tAM saM traM/ oM badz+ra la a na lArga hUM hUM hUM// rdo rje sa sogs drug byas nas// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor/ 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs drug pa ni bri bar bya// 'dir ni hUM las byung ba yi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ba de chen po// phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// mtshan kun gyis mtshan bsgom par bya// dpe byad brgyad cu yang dag 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan// khyab bdag A li kA lis byung // rdo rje dril bus stobs par zhugs// mi yi pags pa rlon pa 'chang // g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ phyag g.yas na ni mdung rtse gsum// thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang // 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): ral pas sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang // zla ba phyed pa'i mthod dang ni// phyag rgya drug gis skul klubs// mthing dang ser dang ljang gu'i zhal// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol// 'jigs byed 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni dus mtshan mo// g.yas brkyang ba yis nyi mar mnan// mgon po ji lta de bzhin du// rdo rje phag mo'ang phyag la sogs// lha mo byin pa yang dag 'khyud// mchog tu dga' bas myos pa mo// dzaHhUM baM hoH
13b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'dis// ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa// rnal 'byor ma drug rtsibs drug la// g.yon du bskor bas rnam bskor bas// dang por lha mo khrag 'thung ma// gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma// gsum pa 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): zag gtum ma dang ni// bzhi pa rdo rje sna byed ma// lnga pa rdo rje drag mo yin// drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin// sngon po ser po ljang gu dang // dmar po dud kha de bzhin dkar// skra bshig ma la drag 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): chen mo// spyan gsum ma ste phyogs kyi gos// phyag ni cig shos phyag gnyis ni// sgra sgrogs Da ma ru dril bus mtshan// mi yi pags pa bsnams pa ste// yi dgas ni// 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i steng na gnas// thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can// g.yas brkyang gdan la yang dag bzhugs// lha rnams thams cad go rim bzhin// yi ge drug las byung ba bsgom// la 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): maM paM te khaM zhes pas// khams lnga po ni byin gyis brlab// oM aM hri ho hUM hrI zhes// gzugs sogs phung po la yang ngo // b+h+rUM hAM kha A ho haM gis// skye mched rnams ni sbyang bar bya// oM/ 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): hA na ma hi/ swA hA tra/ bau ShaTahe/ hA trUM ho/ phaT te/ brang mgo spyi gtsug phrag pa dang // mag la sogs pa sbyar bar bya// oM ba~M ha yo tsi mo h+ye d+hI d+hU hUM phaT phaT// lte ba snying ga kha dang ni/ 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo spyi gtsug gzhan la dgos// lus dang ngag lam sems kyi ni// oM AHhUM ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo bskur drug 'khor lor gnas// lha mo'i tshogs kyi lag gnas pa'i// bdud rtsi lnga 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): yi khu bas gang // thod pa rnams kyis dbang bsur bya// mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi myang // byas par gyur pas spyod par bya// dog pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa bzlas// / 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): oM hrIHha ha hUM hUM phaT/ bsam gtan bzlas pa gang tshe bro// de tshe dag pa rjes zan bya// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal he ru ka'o chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): lag ni khrag 'thung ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gdum ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag ni rdo rje snang byed ma'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o// mgur chug du bu rin chen dang // rna cha gdub kor tshangs skud de// de dag pha rol phyin pa drug 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i gzugs su sbyar ba yin// yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rgyal dka' zla bas btus pa rdzogs so// bag pa po ma gyu kyi ga she ba na@#// rgya ga skad du/ shrI tsakra sa pa/ 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): ra sA d+ha naM a mr-i tak+Sha ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po dgag dka' glang po mchog/ 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): nus pa'i stobs kyis lugs kyus 'gugs// thig stong sangs rgyas nyid myu gu// zla ba'i 'od zer ltar 'phro ba// rang snying pad snang dbus gnas pa'i// zla ba'i gzugs bstan nang dmigs pa// sa rba 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): me rlung mkha' rang bzhin// bskyod med thig le la phyag 'tshal// brda 'ba' zhig ni gtso gyur pa// tshig gi sdebs dang 'brel pa dang // rtag reng rnams dga' ba yi rgyud// dpal ldan 'khor la 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa mchog/ yun rings pa ru rtogs dka' ba// 'brel med skad ni ma lus gsungs// de zab rgya mtsho ltar gnas pa// zab mo su yis shes pa yin// de phyir bdag gis rtsa 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// bshad pa phyi ma yongs shes pas// 'khor lo dag pa de ring brtsams// ri dang nags tshal phug rnams dang // chu bo'i 'gram dang bzhi mdo dang // rgya mtsho chen po nyams/ 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): dga'i 'gram// shing gcig drung dang bde ba'i gnas// gnas ni nye bar bstan pa yin// yang na yid dang mthun par te// de ru rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu thob// snying ga chu 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): / skyes dbus gnas par// nyi mthong pa bsgom par bya// de ru de nyid mchog lta ba// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin zhi// 'od zer sna tshogs rang bzhin mchog/ kun nas/ 
15a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'gro byur pa// sems tsam nyid du gnas pa ste// byang chub mchog ni sgrub par byed// nam mkha'i dbyings su bsgom bya ba// dkyil 'khor mchog dga' bsgom par bya// ti la ga 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): gtams 'dra'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya// 'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams// bla med go 'phang thob bya'i phyir// de ru gsum la skyabs 'gro byas// dam 
15a4(rgyud 'grel): bca' yongs su gzung bya ste// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sangs rgyas he ru ka ru shog/ de nas tshangs pa yi ni gnas// bzhi po rnams ni bsgom par bya// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs// sems ni mchog ste gcig gyur pas// phyi rol nang gi chos rnams ni// thams cad stong par blta bar bya// oM shUn+na tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ata ma ko he// rnam shes so sor skad 
15a6(rgyud 'grel): btsam// sems tsam rnam par brtag par bya// sa yi 'og gi mthar thug par// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// yi ge yaM las yang dag byung // kha dog sngon po gzhunam pa// dru 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'i tshogs kyis bskor// ba dan mtshan bde bsgom bya// de steng yi ge raM las ni// me yi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa// gru gsum kha dog dmar po ni// 'bar ba'i thang ba'i 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs chen po// rimathe ba dang mtshungs bsams// rdo rdzas mtshan pa de bsgom pa// de la steng du chu nyid ni// zlum po 'ang zer phreng ba can// ba me dang ni mtshungs pa nyid// bskyes bum pasamam 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// de yi steng du sa bsgom pas// yi ge lam las byung ba mchog/ gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa la// ser po 'od kyi tshogs kyi bskor// de steng bsgom par bya ba nyid// ri'i rgyal po ri rab mchog/ 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen bdun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// yi ge sum las yang dag byung // 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu 'khrigs// de rur 'dra ba dang // rdo rjes gzhi bla re dang // 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): mda' yi dra ba byin gyis bslabs// me yi dra ba phyi rol nyid// oM me di ni badz+ri b+ha ba ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra bany+dza ra hUM aM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tAn hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): sa ra dz+wa la traM sa traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM hUM hUM// dpal he ru ka 'khor lo// ci bas brgyad rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od// 'dir nya'i gzugs brnyan la gnas blta// rdo rje sems dpa 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgom// de nas lugs byung lugs min pas// khro bo brgyad ni bri bar bya// rdo rjes gtam mo nyi ma me// rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te// rdo rje gnod sbyin bdud rtsi 'khyil// rdo rje dus 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): dang stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba// khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod// sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang gu dud kha'i mdog 'dra dang // dkar po nag po dmar 'dra ba/ 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed thod pa dang ldan gtsigs// de bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug pa// thams cad mi rus rgyan gyis mdzes// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dkyil 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po rnams// zhabs kyis gnon pa rnam par bsgom// thod pa kha T+wAM ga dag bsnams// zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams pa mchog/ dril bu cang 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): te'u thams cad la// shes rab 'khyud pa dam pa bde// skra ser gyen rjes zhal 'gyur zhing // mche ba gtsigs ldan 'jigs byed pa// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis 'jigs mdzad pa// de gyur pa yi bdag nyid las// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par bsgom// drag po khro bo 'bar bas bskor// zhal 'gyur gtsigs shing 'jigs 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// rgyan kun gyis ni kun tu mtshan// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // dril bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ mgo bo'i phreng ba sa lus drag po// mgo bo'i ske rags drag po sa bcings// gdug 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// shes rab dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom par bya// steng dang 'og tu gnas bsam pa// khro bo gnyis
16a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par bsgom// gtsug tor rdo rje sa 'og ste// dkar po mig sngon 'dra ba'i 'od// thod mtshan kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa// phyag na 'khor lo mdung zhags pa// lcags kyu rdo rje dril bu
16a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas// khro bo'i rnam pa'i phur bu ni// phyogs bcu po 'dir dgod par bya// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na 
16a7(rgyud 'grel): huM huM phaT phaT/ byang du'o// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM huM phaT phaT/ nub tu'o// oM A na ya ho// b+ha ga bAn badz+ra rA dza huM huM phaT phaT/ lho ru'o// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): ba gegs rnams kun gyis mgo bo ruM// lugs su 'byung dang lugs min pas// khro bo'i phur bu dgod par bya// oM g+haHg+haHg+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya kI la ya sarba 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): pA paM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+nAM kA ya bka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya kI la ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra kI la ko TA ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje blo mchog khro tshig gis// phyis ni gas 
16b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di bzlas bya// oM kha badz+ra d+h+r-i ga badz+ra hUM ka ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra a nA larka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kuN+Da li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha badz+ra 
16b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ga la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba laM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bI sha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+riSh+NI Sha tsakra brti badz+re hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pa to la~M badz+ra hUM phaT/ de ltar nga rgyal nyid kyis 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): grub// skad cig gis ni bgegs med 'gyur// sngon po ser po ljang gu ni// rdo rje hUM ka ra ru bshad// ser po dang ni nag po ldang // dud kha ser po dang ljang gu// dkar po dang ni ser po lngag// 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang ni ser ljang gu// ljang gu ser po dang nag po// gzhan rnams kyis ni bdag po bzhin// mi bskyod cod pan dam tshig tu// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'chang ba dgyes// de ltar sgom pa byed
16b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas// gal te skyo ba skyes gyur na// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// dran bya dad pas mnyam par bzhag/ oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he oM a ni mi tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): oM a pra Ni hi tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko ha/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag yongs su gyur pa mkha' dbyings te// mkha' dbyings de rubasgom bya ba// yi ge oM ni rnam par bsgom// des ni 'khor 
16b8(rgyud 'grel): lo gnyis ka las// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya// dkar po phyag bzhi rig mas 'khyud// g.yas dang g.yon la 'khor lo dang // thod pa dang ni cang te'u dang // kha T+wAM ga yang de bzhin no// 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): de gyur 'khor lor bcas pa yi// gzhal yas khang ni rnam par bsgom// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis brgyan byas pa// dra ba dra byed dag gis mdzes// 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): dar dpyangs phreng ba dag gis brgyan// zur kun gyis ni cha rnams su// rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi nang du 'khor lo la// re'u mig dgu ste phyir 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): ban drug/ nang ke mig dbus su// sh-i \u0f7fsangs pa'i gwa snang // lce ba gas par bcun// ga tshogs 'drub bcad pa// rimag nams la ltan// sa gzhan 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'dod// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje yis// phreng bas 'khor lo gsum yongs bskor// rin chen phreng bas pad de bzhin// rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od gsal ba'o// sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba yis// dam 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi ni 'khor lo bris// yi dgas kha dog lnga rnams kyis// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor// rdo rje byed pas sgo zur gyi// ka ba'i rtse mo dbus nas mtshan// phyi ru dur khrod 'jigs pa yi// kha dog sna 
17a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs shing rnams nyams dgas mtshan// khyi dang ce spyang dag gis 'jigs// khra dang thug pa bya rgod khra// wa dang rtsi li ka de bzhin// keng rus gdung gis phug pa dang // 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang ba dang ni phyed bsregs dang // spyi bo kos ko pus mo dang // lag pa mgo bo rnams kyis brgyan// sgra sgrogs de bzhin glang mgo dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sbrul gyis dga'// seng ge stag 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): dang phag rgod dang // de bzhin dom dang ra rnams dang // dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// rnam pa sna tshogs 'dus pa mchog/ thod pa kha DA ga ni bsnams// gri gug cang te'u de bzhin no// gnod// 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin ro langs srin po rnams// de ltar sna tshogs dur khrod do// de ru nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor blta// A li kA li rang sa bon// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha'// stong pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/ bya ba grub pa bsgom pa dang // shin tu rnam par dag pa dmigs// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang rig bcas// rim pa 'di 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): shA / rlung sa'ad// tu phyu 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i pags pan bzang bsnams// zhags par nges pa mgo de bzhin// phyag cu gnyis kyi btsun byas pa// sems dpa'i rmyi'i phreng gis bzhugs pa// thod pa'i rtsod pan gyis mi babad/ 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyun rnams kun gyis yang dag rdzogs// mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan// snying ga ye shes dam tshig ste// rdo rje 'chad pa'i cod pan can// thabs ji bzhin du shes rab ste// phyag brgya lnga 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): yis brgyan byas pa// bde chen thabs kyis sbyor ba yis// sku gnyis yang dag zhu bar gyur// 'od zer de las lha mo rnams// langs nas sna tshogs glu yis bskul// khams gsum bde thob 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): kye gtso bo// a la la la to// pad+ma'i bdag po yongs rdo rje// bde chen rgyal ba'i tshogs spro ba// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i gtso// rab yongs a la la la ho// gtso bo drug pa
17b8(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' snying // btsun mo rol sbyor srid gsum bdag/ al la la to// dga' bdag spong zhing rab spong ba// bde chen rang bzhin rgyal ba'i gtso// klu 'di yis ni sbyor ba yis// pad+ma'i 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma yi blangs// pad+ma'i tshogs kyis bzhengs pa ni// rdo rje'i sbyor ba de bas so// mgon po la ni 'di yis bskul// bde ba chen po 'di gnas las// bzhengs nas 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad de// ma lus pa yi rgyal ba spros// zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa gnas// zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang // spyan gsum zhal ni rnam 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan// sku la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo bo dang ni nu ma mnan// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs// rdo rje// 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): ro yis rnam par khyab// rdo rje phag mo la ni 'khyud// 'khyud pa yis ni phyag gnyis la// rtse dgu kha bye rdor dril bu// phyag gzhan gnyis po dag la ni// glang chen pags pa'i na bza' 'chang // g.yas kyi 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni gsum pa la// rdo rjes mtshan pa mdung 'dzin pa'o// bzhi pa la ni lcags kyu ste// lnga pa la ni gri gug ste// drug pa la ni cang te'u'o// g.yon pa'i phyag ni gsum pa la// thod pa ka 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): gis bkang ba'o// mchod phyir thogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// kha T+wAM ga ni bsnams pa'o// sna tshogs 'a phan ni rab tu 'phyang // de steng kha bye rtse lnga pa'i// rdo rje dang ni dril bus mtshan// dbus su sna 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rjes mtshan pa// 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa// bzhi pa la ni rdo rje zhags// lnga pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/ drug pa la ni sta re'o// sngo ser dmar dang ljang gu'i zhal// drag po bzhad sgeg dpa' 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): bo dang // rnga ma dang sngags ni bskyod pa'i zhal// de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni// zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// kha dog dkar po ske rags ni// dum bus mtshan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das zhal/ 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog ltar// lha mo'i phyag gi kha dog de// dmar po ljang gu ser po dang // shin tu sngo mdog zhal gyi 'od// skra grol gcer bu g.yon pa yi// phyag 'khyud pa la ma rungs pa'i// bdud kyi khrag bkang
18b2(rgyud 'grel): zod pa'o// g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub phyogs kun du// gdug pa sdigs shing gri gug 'chang // cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams phyag/ zhal nas khrag ni 'dzag pa ste// zhabs gnyis 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni yang dag dkris// bde chen snying rje'i bdag nyid ma// snying ga'i lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya// ye shes 'khor lo legs bkug ste// mchod bstod
18b4(rgyud 'grel): byas nas bzhugs par bya// 'di nyid kyis ni gnas tshogs rim// dgod bya nang gi sbyor ba mchog/ pu li ram la yar te// spyi bor thod pa'i bum bu dang // rab tu gtum ma'o// dzA 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): lan+d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug tu keng rus chen po dang / gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// o D+yan te rna ba g.yas par keng rus chen po dang 'od can ma'o// aR+YA da ste rgyab kyi char mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): chen ma ste gnas so// gau drA pa r-it+te/ rna ba g.yon par swa ra be ri dang // dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o// rA me shA ri ste smin ma'i dbus su 'od dpag mid dang / mthung ma'o// de bkoT ta mag 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su rdo rje 'od dang // lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// mA lA ya ste/ dpung mgor rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so// 'di dag ni thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ nam mkha' la spyod pa'o// 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): kA ma ru pa ste/ mchan khung dag la myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma'o// oM dre ste/ nu ma gnyis su rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing ngo // tre sha ku ne ste/ lte bar dpa' bo 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can pa'o// ko sa la ste/ sna rtser rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ nye ba'i zhing ngo // ka ling ka ste/ khar ni rab tu bzang po dang // lha mo sngo 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): bsangs ma'o// lam pa ka ste/ mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang / rab bzang ma ste/ tshan do ha'o// kany+tsi ste/ snying gar 'jigs byed chen po dang / rtan ma'o// nyi ma la ste 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): 'doms su mig mi bzang dang / kha ga na ste/ nye ba'i tshan+do ha ste/ gsung gi 'khor los spyod ma'o// pre ta pu ri staM/ mtshan la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// gri ha de ba ta ste 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): bshang ba'i lam du ni rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma ste/ 'dus pa'o// sauraSh+Ta ste/ brla gnyis su rta mgrin dang mchu can ma'o// su b.rA dwI pa ste/ byin pa gnyis la nam mkha'i snying po dang / 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ nye ba'i 'dus pa'o// na ga ra ste/ sor mo rnams la dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo'o// sin+d+hu'i yul te/ rkang pa'i bol dag la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen ma ste/ dur khrod do// ma ru'i yul te/ mthe bong gnyis la rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// ku lu ta ste/ pus mo gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang // brtson 'grus 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): chen mo ste/ nye ba'i dur khrod do// 'di dag ni sa 'og na gnas pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje la'o// lA ma ni dril bu la'o// dum skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma ni glang po che'i lpags pa 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i khu tshur ma'o// khwa gdong ma ni rdo rje mdung ma'o// 'ug pa'i gdong can ma ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o// khyi'i gdong can ma ni rdo rje gri gug ma'o// phag gi gdong can ma ni cang te'u ma'o/ 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje brtan ma ni thod mtshan kha T+wAM ga la'o// gshin rje pho nya ma ni zhag pa la'o// gshin rje mche ba can ni tshangs pa'i mgo la'o// gshin rje 'joms ma ni ster la'o// byang chub kyi sems kyi snod rnams ni zhal bzhi la'o// 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): bu dza o a/ gau rA de mA/ kA o tri ko/ ka la ka ha/ pre gri sau su/ nA si ma ku/ 'khor lo gsum ni yongs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yi ges zhi// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab par bya ba ste// gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad kha dog dkar po oM las byung ba'o// tshor ba la ni rin chen rgyal po gser bsregs pa'i mdog lta bu AM las byung ba'o// 'du shes la 
19b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug kha dog dmar po thiHlas byung ba'o// 'du byed la rdo rje rgyal ba kha dog ljang gu ho las byung ba'o// rnam shes nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' kha dog dkar po hUM las byung ba'o// de bzhin 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad nyid dpal he ru ka kha dog nag po hi las byung ba'o// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs pa// nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan dbus su bzhugs// glang po myur 'gro rma bya dang // rta dang 
19b6(rgyud 'grel): seng ge mkha' lding ste// yi dgas la bzhugs rim pa bzhin// rigs drug bdag po bsam par bya// snying gar rdo rjes gnon yin// gzhan rnams kyis rim pa bzhin// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas na'o// g.yon na gri gug nga rgyal bcas// thams cad la yang spyan gsum nyid// mig dag la bruM gti mug rdo rje dkar po'o// rna ba dag la hUM zhe sdang rdo rje nag po'o// sna 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): la khaM ser sna rdo rje ser po'o// kha la AH'dod chags rdo rje dmar po'o// lus la ho phrag dog rdo rje ljang gu'o// skye mched thams cad la haM// dbang phyug rdo rje kha dog dkar po'o// sa'i khams 
20a1(rgyud 'grel): la laM ltung byed ma ser po'o// chu'i khams la maM 'ching byed mnag po'o// me'i khams la te 'dug byed ma// gser gyi mdog can no// rlung gi khams la yaM pad+ma gar gyi 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug ma dmar mo'o// nam mkha'i khams la khaM bda' bar ma sngonag go// ltung byed ma dang 'ching byed ma// 'gugs byed gar dang ldan de bzhin// rang rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ 
20a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje pad+ma ral gri dang // gri gug g.yas kyi phyag na'o// thod pa nyid dang kha T+wAM ga/ 'di rnams kyis ni g.yon pa mtshan// zhal gsum phyag drug lha mo ni/ 
20a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ye ni 'bar ma yang // thod pa de dran kha T+wAM ga/ 'as pa lcags kyu nyid dang ni// tshangs pa'i mgo dang gri gug ni// 'di yi lag pa rnams la bsam// oM ha snying gar rdo rje sems dkar po// na ma \u0f7f 
20a5(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad ser po'o// swAr+tha bu sde gtsug tu bad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar bya'o// bau ShaT he dpung pa gnyis su shrI he ru ka nag po'o// d+hUhUM ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma dmar po'o// 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): paT hraM lus thams cad la rta mchog ljang gu'o// oM belte bar rdo rje pag mo dmar mo// haM yoM snying gar ya me ni sngon mo// hA mo kha la mongs byed ma dkar mo// hr-ih+ni spyi bor skyod byed ma ser mo/ 
20a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM sti gtsug tu skrag byed ma ljang gu/ phaT phaT lus thams cad la rta mchog ma mtshon cha du ma'i mdog 'dra ba'o// zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje can// de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa// rdo rje dril 
20a8(rgyud 'grel): buM thod pa bsnams// kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u mgo/ 'khor lo la sogs mtshan pa rnams// dril bu thod pa nyid dang ni// kha rje gtsang te'u nyid// gzhan gyi phyag gis mtshon cha yin/ 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): phag mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// dmar po sngon po ljang gu zhal// gri gug thod pa nyid dang ni// zhags pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ lcags kyu de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ lag pa rnams la 'di bsam bya// 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni phyag bzhir bsgom par bya// zhal cig phyag ni gsum pa yi// phyag ni gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM dang // cang te'u dril bu de bzhin no// phag mo rdo rje sems dpa' yin// rnam snang ya mi ni dran bya// 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar dbang rmongs byed ma// skyod byed ma ni he ru ka/ rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma// rta yi mchog ni gdum byed ma// thugs la hUM yig rdo rje yin// A ni ngag gi lam du gnas// yi ge o 
20b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sku rdo rje// nag po dmar po dkar po rim// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// nam mkha' kun tu khyab bltas te// bdud rtsi lnga yis yongs gang ba'i// thod pas dbang bskur tshig 'di yis// 
20b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a 
20b6(rgyud 'grel): b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod// zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// rigs skyes ma 
20b7(rgyud 'grel): mo skyes de bzhin// mi snang mkha' spyod de bzhin no// dma' bar skyes dang mchog de bzhin// bar ma rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sa spyod mkha' spyod de bzhin no// sa yi 'og na gnas pa dang // 
20b8(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo dang // dri za mo'am mi 'am ci// rig pa 'dzin pa sngon grub pa// gang yang bde gshegs brten pa dang // dkon mchog gsum la mos gang dang // de dag thams 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): cad dkyil 'khor lo// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa// gla dang gar gyi mchod pa dang // sna tshogs gang dang 'dod mchog gis// he ru ka la mchod pa byed// rlung dang me yi dkyil 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): stengs su// a las grub pa'i thod pa la// ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis bkang // yi ge bcu drug baM dang ni// oM sogs yi ge gsum byin brlabs// 'khor gsum yang dag spros/ 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// g.yon du bskor zhing rab bskor bas// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma// de bzhin lAldam byang du yin// nub tu dum skyes ma nyid do// lho ru gzugs can ma nyid do// mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog nag/ lA ma kha dog ser por bshad// dum skyes ma ni dmar 
21a5(rgyud 'grel): mo yin// gzugs can ma ni ljang gu'o// zhal cig phyag rgya lnga yis mtshon// bzhi po kun kyang phyag bzhi ma// spyan gsum skra ni grol ba dang // gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i 
21a6(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo bsnams// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa'o// mtshams su gser dang dngul sogs kyi// bum pa'i steng du bzhag bya ba// kun da lta bu bdud rtsi bzhi// byang chub sems kyi thod 
21a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su// pu li ra ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab tu gtum mo dkar mo dang // byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra ra keng rus chen po dang / gtum pa'i mig can ma ser mo// 
21a8(rgyud 'grel): nub tu ur+yan du keng rus dang 'od can ma dmar mo// lhor arbu dar mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ljang gu'o// me'i phyogs su gau dA ba ri ri lha dgra dang / brtan ma'i blo can ma sngo skya ma'o// bden bral/ 
21b1(rgyud 'grel): rA me shA rar/ 'od dpag med dang mi thung ma dkar ser ro/ rlung gi phyogs su de bi ko Ti ri/ rdo rje 'od dang lang ga'i dbang phyug ma ljang gu'o// dbang ldan du mA la bar/ rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma 
21b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i kha dog ste/ thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// skra grol spyan ni gsum pa'o// 'khyud pa yis ni thod pa 'dzin// gdug pa'i sdig mdzub rdo rje 'chang// gtsug rgyan rna rgyan mgul 
21b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang // rkang rgyan tshangs pa'i srad bu can// mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul du brgyan// ske rags sil sel sgra sgroganyid// thod pa'i dum bul sogs pa// dpa' bo zhal cig phyag bzhi pa// rang mtshan 
21b4(rgyud 'grel): ral pa'i cod pan can// snying rjes grags shing 'jigs par mdzad// 'khrud pa yi ni phyag gnyis kyis// cang te'u khan+d+ha lag gzhan la// phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan byas pa// g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas// 
21b5(rgyud 'grel): pas gnas// thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod yin// gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar kA ma ru par myu gu can dang sa srungs ma dkar mo'o// byang o Ter rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo dmar mo'o// 
21b6(rgyud 'grel): nub tu tri sha ku ner/ dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma nag mo'o// lho ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ljang gu ma'o// me'i phyogs ka ling kar/ rab tu bzang po dang / 
21b7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo sngo bsangs ma ser mo'o// bden bral lam pa kar/ rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mo dkar mo'o// rlung gi phyogs kany+tsi ra/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ljang gu'o// dbang ldan
21b8(rgyud 'grel): dra nyi ma la bar/ mig mi bzang dang / khwa gdong mnam mkha'i sngobasangs ma'o// dpa' bod pa' mo rnams kyi ni// rdo rje phyag la pad+ma nyid// gsang gi 'khor los spyod do// klu'i 'khor lo'i 
22a1(rgyud 'grel): shar pre ta pu rir/ stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag mo'o// byang gri ha de btar rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma ser mo'o// nub sau rASh+Ta ra rta mgrin dang / mchu 
22a2(rgyud 'grel): can mad mar mo'o// lho su bar+Na dI par nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha dmar mo'o// me'i phyogs nA ga rar/ dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo dmar mo'o// bden bral gyi phyogs/ 
22a3(rgyud 'grel): sin+d+hu ra/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo zla ba'i mdog can ma'o// rlung gi phyogs ma rur/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur mdu ba'i mdog can ma'o// dbang ldan ku lu tar rdo rje 
22a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang / brtson chen ma dkar mo'o// dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dang po'i phyag na 'khor lo'o// sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og gnas// 'khor lo kun gyi dpa' bo dang // dpa' mo rnams kyi rim ji bzhin/ 
22a5(rgyud 'grel): dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang // pad+ma'i 'khor lo phreng bas mtshan// yang na rang gi 'khor lo yi// kha dog gis ni la rnams kyi// kha dog rab tu brtags par bya// shar dang byang phyogs sgo rnams su// 
22a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo srungs bzhi ni gnas pa ste// khwa gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma// khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma'o// me dang bden bral la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/ gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje po nya/ 
22a7(rgyud 'grel): mo dang / gshin rje mche ba can dang / gshin rje 'joms ma'o// mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo dang // dpa' bo nyid kyang phyag bzhi pa'o// phyogs sgo mtshams nas lha mo rnams// yi dgas kyi ni gdan la
22a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi sbyor ba yis// pad+ma'i steng na sgo srungs rnams// mtshams kyi lha mo'ang de kun la// skyil krung byed pa'i gar gyis gnas// de bzhin mtshams nas lha 
22b1(rgyud 'grel): mo rnams// gzugs nyid kyis ni yid 'phrog ma// g.yas na gri gug lcags kyu zhags// lcags sgrog dang ni dril bu'o// g.yon na me long pi wang dang // dri ro thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ kha gdong la sogs mkha'// 
22b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma// ming dang mthun par zhal dran bya// ma he bong burnga morta// mtshams kyi btsun mo rnams kyi zhal// seng ge stag dang glang po rta// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i zhal// sgo'i rtsa ba'i zur 
22b3(rgyud 'grel): dag tu// mchod pa'i snam bur gnas pa ni// bi wang ma dang gling bum// rnga dung ma dang rnga rngam// gzhang mo sgeg mo glu gar ma// me tog ma dang spos 'chang ma// mar me ma dang dri 'chang ma// me long 
22b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang ro 'dzin ma// reg bya ma dang chos ldan ma// pi wang ma dang sgeg ma sngo// gling bu ma dang glu ma ser// gar mkhan rnga dung ma ni ldang // rdza rnga bzhad pa dkar dang dmar// pi wang gling sogs lha 
22b5(rgyud 'grel): mo yi// pi wang sogs yang sa phyag rnams la// rdo dri la de las gzhan pa la// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'o// rdo dril nga rgyal bcas sgeg mo// glu mkhan ma dang rol bcas ma// pad+ma bskor bcas gar mkhan 
22b6(rgyud 'grel): ma// de ltar thams cad phyag bzhi'o// me tog ma dkar spos du dka'o// mar me ma ni mar me bzhin// dri ma me long ma dmar dkar// ro 'dzin ma dmar reg bya ldang // chos ni dkar por shes par bya// 
22b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi phyag rgya'i sbyor dang ldan// me long la sogs mtshan pa rnams// de las gzhan pa'i lag rnams la// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ cang te'u sgo na gnas pa yi// khe gdong la sogs bzhi yi'o// gri gug kyang 
22b8(rgyud 'grel): ni de bzhin no// dang po'i phyag na mtshan ma'o// dkyil 'khor dpa' bo pa' mo yis// sna tshogs pa yi lha stangs kyi// rnam par g.yeng bas bcom ldan pastod// de bzhin gshegs pa yi ni lam// gtsob 
23a1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus bde chen thob// dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'o// a la la la ho// srid las shin tu grol ba yis// de bzhin gshegs mchog dga' ba yis// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa 
23a2(rgyud 'grel): yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtags pa yin// sku yi 'khor lo mngal nas skyes// gsung ni sgo nga las skyes te// thugs ni rdzus te byung ba'o// thugs ka'i yi ge dam tshig ni// bsnyen pa'i 
23a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba rab tu brtag/ mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs mchog gis// nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba'o// dpa' bo'i lus dgod sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya// dbang bskur yang dag 
23a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba las// sgrub pa chen po bstan pa yin// oM sa ma ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA/ sa ma ya shud+d+ho haM/ chos kun ro gcig mnyam pa las// sems kyis gnas par bya ba yin// ye shes 
23a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba ya si// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung bya// oM badz+ra a mr-i to da ga hUM tha Tha traMHhUM phaT phaT swA hA// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sku yi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// chu gnas 
23a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi 'khor la ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// me yis dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// thugs kyi 'khor lo bde chen po// sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// dam tshig dkyil 
23a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mchog bsgom bya// de ru ye shes dkyil 'khor yang // de bzhin bsgom bya rnam par bsgom// mchod bstod yang dag mnyes byas te// dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba yin// 
23a8(rgyud 'grel): ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa// de srid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom// skyo gyur rnam par dag dran bya// gang chos rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni// dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo ste// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
23b1(rgyud 'grel): chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag nyid brtan par bya'o// de la dag pa dang bde ba dang / rtag pa dang bdag rnams kyi phyin ci log bzhi rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang // tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang // chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang // sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la sems kyis ma brjed/ 
23b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de'i nye bar 'jog pa ni dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'o// de yang brjed ngas pa'i gnyen por gyur pa ste// sngon nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la nye bar 'jog pa ni 'dris pa'i yon tan no// 'byung ba dang 
23b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tshogs ni lus so// bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni chos so// so sor snang ba tsam gyis rnam par shes pa ni sems so// de rnams kyi 
23b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran pa ni nye bar gzhag pa ste/ lus la sogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par yang yang 'byung ba mi dge ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa dge ba'i mi mthun
23b6(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa/ le lo dang ma dad pa la sogs pa ste/ 'dun pa la sogs pa 'di dag dmigs pas spong ba ni// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba dang // 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par bsrung ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
23b8(rgyud 'grel): 'phel ba'o// de'i yan lag ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa'o// de la spong 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): / bar 'du byed dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / rten pa med pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / yongs su gyur pa nyid shes pa ni 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dun pa'o// de la rnam par 'byed pa ni lam mo// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ste mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'gog pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po kun tu mi 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'o// de rnams mi rten pa rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gogs pa la brten pa med pa'o// kun tu sbyor ba ni 'dus byas thams cad kyi dngos po la yang dag par sbyor ba'o// 
24a4(rgyud 'grel): de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o// lta bar byed pa'i shes pa 'di dag ni mig la sogs pa mtshungs pa'i dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po bstan par bya'o// de yang rnam pa lnga ste/ 
24a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// de la dad pa ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 
24a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang dag pa'i lta ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa la sems yid ches pa'o// sems kyis kun tu sbyor ba ni brtson 'grus so// dad pa'i dbang po la brten nas
24a7(rgyud 'grel): chos gang ma brjed pa ni brtson 'grus bstan to// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ma brjed cing don ma brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// dran pa'i dbang pos chos rnams ma brjed pa gang mngon du byed pa ni ting nge// 
24a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis dbang por bstan to// ting nge 'dzin gyis rtse gcig par byas pa'i chos gang khyad par du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// ma dad pa dang le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / bag med pa 
24b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rnam par g.yeng ba la sogs pa mi mthun pa zad pa las khyad par thob pa'i dbang po nyid stobs su bstan te// 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / 
24b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyis stobs so// rang nyid kyis yang dag par khong du chud pa 'di ni byang chub ste sems gnyis dang bral ba'o// de'i rgyu ni byang chub kyi yan lag go/ de rnams kyang bdun te/ 'di lta ste/ dran 
24b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu spang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ de la sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa dang // 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ston pa dang / thos shing khyong du chud pam brjod pani na pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// bdag la sogs pa'i chos rnams mi mthun pa'i phyir/ byung la sogs pa 'byed pa ni chos 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ chos rnams ro gcig pa'i sems ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// dga' ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdag dang bdag gis bag 
24b7(rgyud 'grel): chags bcom pa las/ lus dang ngag dang sems las su rung ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / stong pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings te/ 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): tshad ma bzhil sems rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// so so'i skye bo'i sa las nges par byung ba ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying po ma yin pa lus dang ngag dang sems kyi 'du byed la ltos pa med pa ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ sdig pa 'ba' zhig dang rjes su mthun pa'i nyon
25a2(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do// shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba'i sgom pas 'tshol ba ni lam mo// de'i phyir 
25a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad du bstan te/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho 
25a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'jig rten 
25a5(rgyud 'grel): pha rol la blta ba'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni blang ba dang dor ba dag spong ba dang / mngon du byed pa yid kyi byed pa dang / dge ba 'bar zhig la sems pa'o// yang dag pa'i ngag ni bden 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): pa mthong ba'i don ston par byed do// yang dag pa'i las kyis mtha' ni// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang gong na med pa'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni rigs pas bskyed pa'i don to// 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la rjes su sbyor ba lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams ma 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): brjed pa'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa'i rnam pa mngon du byed pa'i sems so// rdo rje sems dpa' cod pan ni/ rnam dag ye shes lnga nyid do// dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags
25b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni// tshangs pa'i sras bur rab tu brtag/ rdo rje phag mo'i sngags kyis ni// mgul gyis mgul rgyan mtshan pa'o// lha yi snying po gsang sngags ni// brgya phyed phreng ba sa brgyan pa'o// yi ge
25b2(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyis gsang sngags ni// rna ba'i rna cha mdzes pa yin// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags// pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa'o// rnal 'byor ma ni drug gis sngags// sked pa ske
25b3(rgyud 'grel): rags brgyan pa'o// dpa' bo'i go cha drug nyid ni// phyag rgya sku la brgyan pa'o// 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor mo// sngags ni thod pa'i btung ba'o// rnam snang mdzad ma'i sngags gang yin// 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): mgo bor brgyan pa'i thod pa'o// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang // lus kyi khams su brtag pa yin// lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lnga 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o// sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// ye shes kyi pad+ma'i rnam par dag pa'o// bdun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
25b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o//
