66a6(rgyud 'grel): da// brnyan / 'gyun ldan pa na / sa dun shi / dung du ya nam bdang // gas dgas spyod sgyu g+sa/ 
66a7(rgyud 'grel): bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gi mnyam med sems can don// grags pa mtha' yas spyod pa yi// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/ 
66a8(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas byang bar 'gyur lags na// grags pa mtha' yas spyod pa yi// tshul la gnas pa zlas ci dgos// de ltar blo bar bskyed nas kyang // yi ge bdun pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i// ku sha de la rab tu sbyin// ril ma dgas 
66b1(rgyud 'grel): mi dge brtag/ tshogs 'khor byas la bkra shis brjod// gtor ma btang nas ye shes gshegs// dam tshig bsdus la ci bder gnas// slob ma lha gon no// srad bu ye shes lnga ldan zhing // nyi shu rtsa lngar rnam phye bas/ 
66b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni// sras bu phan tshun bsgril bar bya// oM an+don+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmaHpa ra s+pha ra a nu pre biSh+Ta sarba d+harmAHa t+yan a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmAHdkyus su dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la// sboms su 
66b3(rgyud 'grel): sgo yi nyi shu cha// bdud rtsi brgyas ni byug par bya// yi ge thig ni bskyed nas su// dza gsum brjod nas lte bar ni// g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas// blo ldan nam mkhar thig gdab bya// de bzhin sa la 
66b4(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya// khru phyed la sogs brtsams nas ni// ji srid khru ni brgya yi bar// dang po tshangs pa'i thig yin te// gnyis pa la ni zur thig gdab// gsum pa phyogs kyi thig btab la// bzhi pa cha chen bcu drug gdas 
66b5(rgyud 'grel): chaphran bzhi bzhir bgos byas pa// spyir na cha chung drug cu bzhi// ngas gcig la ni sum cu gnyis// dkyil 'khor nang la bcu drug las// gnyis lnga gtso bo'i pho brang ste// gsum bzhi lnga drug bde chen gyi/ 
66b6(rgyud 'grel): lo pad+ma 'dab brgyad bya// bdun pa gri gug phreng ba la// brgyad dang dgu pa thugs 'khor lo// bcu pa rdo rje phreng ba ste// bcu gcig bcu gnyis gsung yin te// bcu gsum pad+ma'i phreng ba'o// bcu bzhi bco lnga sku 
66b7(rgyud 'grel): yi sa// bcu drug 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor// de ni nang gi dkyil 'khor la// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid kyang // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyed 'phyang ba mdzes// 
66b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yer ka'i phreng ba'i dra ba can// mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo 'khrud kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis spras dang // rdo rje rab me 'od bcas// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol tu// shing la sogs pa'i dur khrod bya// 
67a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par// ji ltar mdzes pa rab tu brtag/ thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi// dman dang lhag pas nad 'byung ste// phyogs la 'khrul na slob ma myos// de bas 
67a2(rgyud 'grel): skyon med shes par bya// thig gdab pa'o// // rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la sogs pa ste// ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma'am// dur khrod so phag ldan pa la// brum kha la sogs yig 'bru/ 
67a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga// yongs 'gyur tshen rtsi lnga ru bsam// slob dpon dbang ldan phyogs su ni// song ste mnyam par bzhag nas su// lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis// ri mo lnga ni dgyes par bya// 'di ni tshes dbyings dge/ 
67a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// sems can khams ni sgrol mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas// me long la sogs rim brjod nas// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ldang // kun gyi nang 
67a5(rgyud 'grel): rol nag po ru// mtshan gyi cha ni rim bzhin dgye// tshon rtsi re re'i zheng du ni// sgo yi nyi shu cha yi tshad// phan tshun bar du nas re tsam// mtho la drang bar bri bar bya// gal te tshon rtsi mi mnyam zhing // yo dang dma' bar 
67a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur na ni// ri mo dma' bas dngos mi 'grub// yon pos gdung ba skyed byed pa// de nyid mtho bas nang du 'gyur// chad ni slob dpon slob ma dag/ gnyis ka 'chi bar shes par bya// g.yas skor ma yin bris nas ni/ 
67a7(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshan pur bus gdab par 'gyur// dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ni// gi sar yang dag ldan pa la// mtshams su bum pazod pas brgyan// gser gyi mdog du bri bar bya// mthing shun phye ma la sogs pas// thugs kyi 
67a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// rdo rje 'khor los bskor bar bya// byu ru la sogs mdog 'dra bas// gsung gi 'khor lo rtsib brgyad pa// pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor ba bri// mu tig la sogs phye mas ni// sku ni 'khor lo bri byas/ 
67b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// ji ltar pad+ma'i kha dog bzhin// sgo bzhi'i cha yang de bzhin te// shar phyogs su ni dkar po ste// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang du mar 
67b2(rgyud 'grel): ka ta yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni// in+d+ra ni la 'od 'bar ba'i// grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo 'khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa// mnyam par gzhag pas yang dag/ 
67b3(rgyud 'grel): bri/ rdo rje ra ba'i nang du ni// dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste// gtum drag de bzhin tshang tshing dang // rdo rje 'bar bkang rus can// dbang ldan du ni mi bzad gzhan// byin za ru ni bkra shis mchog/ mun pa drag 
67b4(rgyud 'grel): po bden bral du/ rlung du kI li kI li sgra// shar du shiR+Sha a shwang shing // kang ke khyad par rtswa ta'i shing // ba da de bzhin ka rany+dza// la da ba ra ka par thi ka/ dbang po de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // klu'i dbang dang 
67b5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i bdag/ dbang ldan de bzhin byin za dang // srin po'i dbang po rlung gi bdag/ ba su ki dang 'jog po nyid// pad chen hu lu hu lu dang // dbang ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo // sgrogs pa dang ni cher sgrogs dang // drag dang 
67b6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan bstan de bzhin// gang ba dang ni de bzhin 'bebs// gtum po 'di dag srid dbang phyug/ rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams dang // dngos grub rdzu 'phrul yang dag par// thob pa slob dpon gyi ni tshogs// dur khrod 
67b7(rgyud 'grel): dbus su lta bar bya// // de nyid bsdus dang bde mchog dang // gsang ba rdo rje 'jigs byed las// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// tshon dgye ba'o// de nas slob dpon mnyam
67b8(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pas// dkyil 'khor dbus nas dur khrod sar// lhag chad nyes pa'i skyon bsal la// skor ba lan gsum brtsams par bya// bum pa mchod rdzas la sogs pa// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rol mo dang // sil/ 
68a1(rgyud 'grel): / snyan glu yis spyan drangs la// dkyil 'khor gnas su dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen nam// gser rnams kyis ni mdzes par bya// de nas slob dpon khrus byas te// dri zhim rus 
68a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyan gyis spras// rtse bran rdo rje dril 'dzin pa// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lho phyogs su// bde ba'i gdan la 'dug nas ni// bla ma dam pa lU yi pas// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa rnams// bsgom te bzlas/ 
68a3(rgyud 'grel): pa byas pa'i mthar// bcu drug lha mo rnams kyis mchod// me tog bdug pa mar me dri// dkar po dung mdog dmar ba ljang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis rtsa bar brtags// 'dam bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ gzhan gyi phyag 
68a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag na 'dzin// pi wang gling bu rnga zlum ma// rdza rnga zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// gnyis kyis rang dang brdung bar brtson// tha ma rdo rje'i dril bu 'dzin// sngo ser dmar po ljang gu'o// phreng ba sgeg mo glu gar ma// dmar dkar 
68a5(rgyud 'grel): ser mo ljang gu ste// phreng ma phyag gnyis phreng ba 'dren// rdo rje dril 'dzin sgeg pa mo// glu ma 'khar ba'i sil khrol te// gar ma pad+ma'i gar spyod byed// gzhan gnyis thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ gzugs dang ro dang reg dang chos// 
68a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar ljang gu dkar mo ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dang po na// me long dung dri gos chos 'byung // 'dam bu thod pa kha n+ta ga/ lhag ma'i phyag na gnas pas mchod// rkang pa brgyad kyis bstod byas la// bshags 
68a7(rgyud 'grel): dang gsol ba la sogs bya// ga Na tshogs kyis mchod pa yis// dkyil 'khor lha kun mnyes byas la// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro ma rnams la// ba laM chen po'i gtor ma byin// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i don du ni// 
68a8(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// zhi dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni// slob ma sdig sogs sbyong ba'i phyir// ji ltar 'grub pa'i grang rnams byas// me tog phreng 'dzin slob dpon gyis// lho yi sgo nas zhugs nas 
68b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang / he ru ka dpal rgyal po la// chu dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa// rjes gnang mtha' ru rim bzhin no// rigs la rjes gnang thob pa dang // slob ma shis par bya ba'i phyir// bden pa 'di ni bsgrag par bya// don dam smra 
68b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba// nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa// srid pa'i nyes pa bskyed pa nyon mongs bcom mdzad pa// rnal 'byor don dam de nyid rgyal po grub par mdzod// dkyil 
68b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sgrub pa'o// // kun byed chu yis khrus byas la// de yi bu sdug gdong la ni// dar gyis legs par dkris nas ni// yol ba'i mthar ni drangs pa la// bla mas 'di skad dri bar bya// sdug pa khyod su tsi la 
68b4(rgyud 'grel): dga'// des kyang bdag ni bskal pa bzang // bde ba che la rtag tu dga'// de nas las kun byed pa'i chus// yol ba'i phyi ru bsang gtor bya// de nas slob mas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas kun gyis rang bzhin 
68b5(rgyud 'grel): sku// slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo// rnal 'byor rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par mdzod// bla mas kyang / 
68b6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog/ snying po bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// de nas lho sgor mngon phyogs la// 
68b7(rgyud 'grel): oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM/ lus ngag yid kyi phyag gsum bya// snying gar rdo rje rab bzhig la// rnal 'byor sems ni bskyed par bgyi// oM yo ga tsid+d+hit+pAd+hA ya mi/ su rasta sa ma ya s+t+waM hoHsid+d+ha 
68b8(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ya thA su khe/ de yi spro ba skyed pa ni// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis// ngas khyod la he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
69a1(rgyud 'grel): cad dang / dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos kyis// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ 
69a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag du dral te gshegs// bdud rtsi lnga yi chu dag ni// thod par legs par byugs 
69a3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// mna' chu blung phyir 'di skad brjod// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'thob// oM bany+tsa a pre tod kaSh+ThaSh+ThaSh+Ta 
69a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyis// ngas kyis cig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos so// khyod nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung 
69a5(rgyud 'grel): ra 'gyur ta re// // de nas dpa' bo dang nal 'byor ma thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ dpal he ru ka ba dgral 'bab par mdzod cig ces sgrar gzhug go// bdud rtsi lnga dang byi la'i thun// gu gul bud med 
69a6(rgyud 'grel): gos kyi mtha'// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas su// dur khrod me la bdug par bya// g.yas brkyang bal legs bsdams te// gnyis med gsang sngags bzlas byas nas// skad cig nyid la yang dag 'jug/ oM tISh+Tha 
69a7(rgyud 'grel): mthu bor+ha A be sha yadz+dza/ oM shrI he ru ka ya bid+me ho/ bit+tA rA dza ya nI ma he swAt+ma/ zhes ni dpa' bo bskul bar bya// de nas yon thogs grong khyer du// skor b.lan gsum byas nas ni// bsten nas snyems pa'i matog 
69a8(rgyud 'grel): ngor// pra t+tir+yA badz+ra ho// dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs// de yi rigs ni bstan par bya// slar yang de nyid blangs nas su// slob ma'i mgol bcing bar bya// he ru ka dpal dang khyod kyi// mig ni 'byed par brtson 
69b1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra Ne tra a pa ha ra phaT laM tsi// brjod nas gdong g.yogs phud nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu 
69b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rig skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang // dngos grub bu khyod skal ldan 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang // gsang sngags la 
69b3(rgyud 'grel): yang brtson par gyis// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid ni// dbus kyi pad+ma rin chen 'dzin// thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa// gsung gi 'khor lo snang mtha' yas// sku yi 'khor lo rnam snang mdzad// sbubs rnams kun
69b4(rgyud 'grel): ni don yod la// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga la// gru ba ni tshangs pa'i sgo bzhi gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// ka ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad// gdong bzhi ye shes bzhi yi
69b5(rgyud 'grel): don// tro ra Na la sogs pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// rnam shes dag pa dur khrod la// phyogs skyong mi dge bcu po spong // sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan ma shing // gdug pa 'joms phyir shing brgyad do// 
69b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i rtags su sprin brgyad do// de nas lha'i rnam dag ni// dpa' bo che la bu khyod ltos// dbyibs dang ye shes gnyis med pas// yu ma dang gnyis su med pa yin// mthing ga skyon gyis ma gos pa// zhal bzhi rnam par 
69b7(rgyud 'grel): thar pa bzhi// spyan ni dus gsum mkhyen pa ste// rten 'brel dag pas phyogs bcu gnyis// pha rol phyin pas rgyan drug la// 'khor lo lnga yi lha rnams ni// sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs// yin par mngon rtogs 
69b8(rgyud 'grel): gzhung ltar sbyar// slob ma gzhug pa'o// de nas slob mas bla ma yi// zhabs la dad pas phyag bya ste// thal sbar yon ni phul ba yis// dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar 
70a1(rgyud 'grel): ma mnan lag pa/ dag thang dang ba'ad med// rnams na dang bdug gsu// da nga da 'aM// 'ad ba brgyad dbyas su'i ba shams te/ thobs tag pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ 
70a2(rgyud 'grel): sa rnabs bzhag pa bya// nams nam rgyal bum par ban+d+ha// me pra byud par ba stesanapa // ky-il 'khyer lus la btsu nas su// zlab ma'i bar bkra bar \u0f7f// dbang bska rje chen pa ni// 9 
70a3(rgyud 'grel): gnam ldan rjes phrag byas pas// g.yang ga sum gnas las byung ba y-i// sangs kyi na gyi chu dbang b+ha~M// oM s+yAd/ ad+hi Shany+dzA me// shid ngam na che du brdzun la// rin chen 'byung bar bskyed nas sa/ 
70a4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa 'id lus lag ngagasum gnas las la/ sa rgyas dun ci nga // de nga byed la bcur bar bya// da ca dam brjid kyis 'ang / na da can pa'i rlo/ 'ad pag 
70a5(rgyud 'grel): oM b+hi'i u mi/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ a las bskyed pa'i 
70a6(rgyud 'grel): dri bu yang // lag pa lon par byin nas ni// dam tshig 'khor lo rus la gzug/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad// thod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcar// byang chub mchogs 
70a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba bzhed// srid par po nyid kyi sa dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni// srid pa'i dam pa byed par 'gyur// dzadza dril bu skye bar ni// dam par snang mdzad cu'i rnam banam// 
70b1(rgyud 'grel): oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ oM shrI he ru ka nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ shI yi sgra dang bcas pa 'dis// rigs las drangs te ming dbang bskur// chu dang cod par rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni ming dbang bskur// 
70b2(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs lnga yi bdag nyid de// phung po lnga dang nyon mongs dag/ rig pa'i dbang lnga'o// srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // sdug bsngal chen po zhib byed pa// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig rtag tu bskyed// 
70b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// yid kyis lus ni brtan pa'i phyir// phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces byar brjod// / dam tshig gsum ni byin nas su// de nas sngags kyi dbang bskur byin// nyi shu rtsa gnyis yi ge mchog/ bdag gis bcom 
70b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'dir byin lags// 'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol// bdag gi bcom ldan 'dir bzung lags// bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol// zhes pas sngags kyi dbang bskur byin// gzhan don nus pa'i gtso chen gyis/ 
70b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang skur don du gsol ba gdab// he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba// 'gro ba skyob phyir gzi brjid can// ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs// de bzhin bdag la de gsol cig/ dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i// 
70b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba ni bdag la gsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// de nas brtul zhugs sbyin pa ni// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// he ru ka dpal phyag na bsnams// 
70b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs bstan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM badz+ra saM ma ya a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM e Sha s+t+waM/ d+ha ra yA mi hUM ha ha ha ha hrIHrdo rje'i brtul zhugs so// kha T+Ta tsa 
70b8(rgyud 'grel): te pad snod sogs// dpa' bo chen pos blang bar bgyi// he ru ka yi phyag rgya 'di// phyi rol nang na yang dag gnas// spyod pa'i brtul bzhugs so// // g.yon pa'i phyag gis chos gos mtha'// brtul zhugs can
71a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzung ba dang // g.yas pas mi 'jigs sbyin par bya// slob ma lung ni bstan par bya// oM 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i 
71a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro kun nas bton// oM shrI he ru ka ke ti na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ b+hur b+hu ba swa// khyod ni 'khor lo gsum dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// he ru ka dpal zhes bya/ 
71a3(rgyud 'grel): ba// de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to// deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor ma deng dpa' tshogs dang // shes rab thabs kyis bsnyems chen gyis// gar chen bde bas dga' ston gyis// gar ro// 
71a4(rgyud 'grel): sgeg dang bcas pa'i phreng bar bya// sangs rgyas kun sogs rnal 'byor ma// des ni bral bar mi 'gyur te// phreng ba 'di ni rgyan yin no// phreng ba'o// lus can kun la dam chos kyi// khyod kyi glu ni blang bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor 
71a5(rgyud 'grel): mde dang // mchog tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur// glu'o// khyod kyis rgyal la dri phul la// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang // rnal 'byor ye shes mthong ba yi// byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos// dri'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas/ 
71a6(rgyud 'grel): la spos phul nas// brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis// lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su// ye shes kyis ni tshim par 'gyur// spos so// chos kyi mar me legs sbar na// pad+ma gar dbang rang nyid 'gyur// 
71a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can ma rig ljongs rnams la// ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis// mar me'o// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yi// 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyi bsal// 
71a8(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra NaM tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrIHthur ma'o// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod med pa// rgyu dang las las kun du byung // ngo bo nyid med gnas med par// 
71b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar chos 'di shes gyis la// sems can don ni mnyam med gyis// 'on tang rnal 'byor ma sras skye// me long ngo // khyod ni the tshomadog med par// yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis ni// chos kyi dung ni bla// 
71b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa// dri med kun tu dag par gyis// dud do// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ sdang bar bya dang gnas pa dang // bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs te// las de rnams ni grub par gyis// ral gri mig sman sa
71b3(rgyud 'grel): 'og dang // shing lham de bzhin ri lu ste// rnal 'byor ma yi dngos grub rnams// ci dga' bar ni grub par gyis// shes rab thabs dag rang bzhin gyis// yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin du// skyo dub dogs pa ma byed 
71b4(rgyud 'grel): par// da ni sems can don rnams kyis// byang chub snying po mthar thug par// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// kun nas rab tu bsor bar gyis// dgun zla 'bring po nas brtsams 
71b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// yar ngo mar po'i tshes bcul// 'bad pas dpa' bo chang sogs kyis// rdo rje lha mo rab tu mchod// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas na// de khyod sdig pa thams cad 
71b6(rgyud 'grel): las// rnam grol bzang por 'gyur bar gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyam gsungs pa'i// rjes gnang mchog tu dbugs dbyung ba// dngos grub mtshan nyid snum pa ni// 'di dag rtag tu bsrung bar gyis// slob 
71b7(rgyud 'grel): ma dad pa'i stobs kyis ni// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bgyi zhes smra bar bya// dbang bskur rjes gnang thob pa yis// bya ba byas pas rab dgod cing // kun tu 
71b8(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar byed pa yi// 'jam pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya// deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag gi gson pa 'bras bur bcas// de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes// sangs rgyas sras su gyur te// 
72a1(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i mtshon chen rab 'jigs pa// nyon mongs 'dam ni brgal dka' zhing // mnar med la sogs skye ba 'khrungs// mgon po khyod kyis bdag bsgral lo// bag chags thams cad spangs pa yi// 
72a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub dam pa bdag 'tshal ba// khyod zhabs lam gyi bka' drin gyis// rdzogs pa nyid du bdag gyur to// slob dpon dbang bskur yang dag rdzogs// bum pa las ni byung ba'o// gnyis pa gsang ba mchog yin te// 
72a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin// bzhi pa de ltar yang de bzhin// dbang bskur 'di dag yang dag ldan// de ni dam tshig can zhes bya// bla ma'i ngag la rtogs pa'i phyir// mchog dbang gsum po gsal ma byas// rdzogaso// 
72a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas gzhan yang rab gnas kyi// cho ga pha rol son pa bshad// sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// slob dpon du ni rab tu brtag/ lugs ma mngon par 'dus byas pa'i// sku gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni// rab gan 
72a5(rgyud 'grel): don du sa sbyang zhing // bla bre rgyal mtshan ba dan rnams// brgyan cing sa ni yongs su bzung // sku gzugs sam ni glegs ba ma mam// bris sku yongs su rdzogs pa rnams// mdun rol du ni gnas par bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo/ 
72a6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' gnas// nyer spyod lnga yis yang dag mchod// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho// lan gsum du ni brjod par bya// ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// dga' ldan yang dag gzigs nas ni// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums
72a7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs ltar// de bzhin 'dir ni gzhugs su gsol// che ge zhes bya'i don du ni// byang chub sems ni yongs sbrel phyir// me tog la sogs 'di bzhes te// mgon po 'dir ni brtag bzhugs mdzod// tshigs 'dis de
72a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rnams// lhag par gnas pa byas nas ni// mkhas pa yis ni bstod byas na// yungs kar gyis ni bskor nas kyang // lan gsum du ni spang bar bya// bdag chal gyis ni khrus kyang bya// dri zhim ldan pa'i mar 
72a9(rgyud 'grel): sa thamathas pa mamasam ya ngas pang ma yam sa ra ma ma sams ma ma mam samam mamamatha ra ya ma tha sa pa ba nga ma ma pa ma 'amamam ma ba yang ba ya ba ba ngar ma par dag par ba ma pa sa 
72b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi byug/ slar yang bum pa so so yi// sku gzugs rnams ni khrus kyang bya// phyi nas nam mkhar gnas pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcom ldan 'das// lugs ma la sogs rab zhugs bya// yul chos la sogs ji bzhin du/ 
72b2(rgyud 'grel): las bcu yis ni bya ba bya// spyan ni dbye ba byas nas su// rdo rje'i spyan du byin gyis brlab// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten ling thog bsal bltar// de bzhin rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan// sems can don du dbye bar bgyi// oM/ 
72b3(rgyud 'grel): tsak+sha swar+thas mAn+ta drA br-i shan ya staH// dngum byin nus spyan bya'o// rdo rje'i sgran byin gyis brlab// 'gra rnams rgyas kyis 'bangs pa la// rgyal pas chas kyi drang bus spyang // de bzhin sems can na gyi phyid// rgyal ba'i sman ni kyi 
72b4(rgyud 'grel): pabar bya// oM daM byaM kar Na ye swA hA// gser gyi rmangs tshes shangs phye la// rdo rje'i shangs su byin gyis brlab// zag bcas phung po dri spangs pa'i// 'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir// rnam par dag pa'i dri bskyed ltar// rgyal po'i 
72b5(rgyud 'grel): shangs ni dbye ba b+ha// oM d+hi b+hag+hA Na ye swA hA// zhal zur gyis zhal phyel// rdo rje'i zhal du byin gyis brlab// chos kyi ro yi dga' ba yis// 'gro ba thams cad tshi ma mdzad pa// ro mchog brgya ldan zhal rnams// dbul phyir rgyal ba'i/ 
72b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal dbye'o// oM di bya mu kha ye swA hA// choms shing gis tshems phyis la// rgyal po'i tshoms dkar bzhi bcu la// mi gtsang rdul gyi mgos te// bskur sti rin chen ljon shing gis// rgyal ba'i tshems ni dbye ba bya// ras kyi sku byis
72b7(rgyud 'grel): la// rgyal bas nyes pa'i skyon spangs kyang // sems can nyes pa sbyang slad du// ras dkar gtsang ma'i pho ldi yis// rgyal ba rnams ni sku phyi'o// oM kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA// rab byung yin na gser gyi spu gris dbu skra bzhar la// ji ltar 
72b8(rgyud 'grel): rang byung mchod rten du// rgyal bas khyim pa'i rtags spangs ltar// 'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir// khyim pa'i rtags rnams spang bar bya// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad yin na// rgyal ba'i dbu skra lung lo la// dug gsum dri mas 
73a1(rgyud 'grel): mgos te/ bkur sti dung gi so mangs kyis rgyal ba'i dbu skra bshad par bya// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na gnas rnams la// 'khor ba'i yo byad rnams phul la// 'gro ba sems can la kun la phan pa'i
73a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rigs pa'i gnas ldad dgal bslab bya zhes// ji ltar thugs dam rgya cher ba zhes pa ltar// mkho ba'i yo byad rnams ni dbul bar bya// oM bo d+hi satwa/ oM yu ka sa pa ri s+pha ra ye swA hA// de nas rdzas kyi mchod pa'am// 'dod// 
73a3(rgyud 'grel): yon lnga yi mchod pa las// spyan la sogs pa'i skyed mches la// ci rigs par ni mchod par bya// de nas mnga' che ba'i rdzas dbul te// rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyad// sman lnga la sogs mkho ba'i rdzas// rdo rings gleg 
73a4(rgyud 'grel): zag la sogs dbul// rin chen mnga' dbul 'dir me brjod// bkra shis brgyad kyis mnga' dbul ba// ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// bkra shis dpal be'u g.yu drung 'khyil// dge ba'i don du mnga' bltar// bdag gis dpal 
73a5(rgyud 'grel): be'u dpral bar btso// de ltar sngon gyi sangs rnas pa// gsar kyi 'khor lo makrud can// tshangs bachen pos bral ba ltar// de bzhin pa dag gis dbul bar gyi// ji skar sngon gyi sangs rgyas pa// gdug dkar gsor gyi yub can// 
73a6(rgyud 'grel): bral ba de bzhin padag dbul gyis// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// nyon mongs bdud las rgyal ba yi// chos kyis rgyal mtshan bral bltar// de bzhin bdag gis dbul bar bgyi// ci bde bar ni bzhen 
73a7(rgyud 'grel): sugasol// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'i// bum pa bzang po bral ba ltar// bdag gis de bzhin dbul bar bgyi// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// 'dam gyi skyon gyi mgos pa'i// 
73a8(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po phul bltar// de bzhin bdag gis dbul bar bgyi// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// snyan pa phyogs bcur sgrogs pa yi// bud dung g.yas 'khyil phul bltar// de bzhin bdag gis dbu 
73b1(rgyud 'grel): b.rabartsi// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// na bza' gser gyi dang ris can// dul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul gyis// ci bde bar ni gzhes su gsol// de las gzhan pa'i mnga' dbul ba ni// 
73b2(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rnams las 'bru phul bas// zas kyi 'byor pa ldan pa dang // dge ba'i lo tog rgyas gyur cig/ rin chen sna lnga phul ba yis// bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi ba dang // longs spyod// 
73b3(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ bde gshegs rnams la sman bul bas// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi/ nad kyi sdug bsngal byang gyur nas// zugs rje'i sman gyis gdul gyur cig/ snying po rnam pa lnga phul bas// bdag dang 
73b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grob thams cad kyis// ye shes rnam pa lnga rtogs te// yang dag snying po ldan gyur cig/ de nas gur kum la sogs chus// dri sgo'i phyir na bkru bar bya// mchod rten glegs pa ma la sogs la// dbang po skye mched med pa'i phyir// spyan dbye// 
73b5(rgyud 'grel): mags tha ma gad // A p+na ba dang thus byaste// ma tham sa thag da dang / 'ab ba Na ba rgyam macan dang // gdugs las gas pa'i mi byad nams// badzad rten rnams pa dbul par bya// gsang ga rten du gnas byung na// thugs/ 
73b6(rgyud 'grel): shing phul la/ chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bur dag pa la// sdom dang mi sdom mtshan ma nyid med kyang // nyi zla lta bu'i glegs shing 'di 'phul bas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med 'brel bar shog/ glegs thag phul la/ tshes dpyid// 
73b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur med rdo rje'i rang bzhin la// bcings dang ma bcings mtshan ma gnyis med kyang // rin chen sna lnga'i glags thag 'di phul bas// 'gro ba'i don la rgyalag byed par shog/ na bza' phul la/ rin chen 'byung gnas dam chos bdud rtsi la// 
73b8(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sna tshogs rin chen rgyan sbas pa'i// rin chen rgyan pa'i na bza' 'di gsol bas// chu la sogs pa'i bar chad med par shog/ de ltar mnga' dbul byas nas kyang // sbyin sregs las kyis rdzogs par bya// / kun nal ni me yin pas/ 
74a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas rab tu gnas par bya// rab gnas yang dag rdzogs dus su// bstod dang bkra shis brjod bya zhing // bro dang gar srogs sil snyan sgra// ji ltar snyed pa rab tu brjod// lha mo rnams kyi dam tshig
74a2(rgyud 'grel): tshad ma dang // des bshad gsung ni chad mar gyur pa ste// bden pa des na lha mo rnams kyis 'dir// rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur ni 'gyur bar shog/ tsA ru bza' bar ldan pa dang // cho gar yang dag ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor 
74a3(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams legs 'dus to// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin// sngon mo dang ni yon dbul bas// skye bo tshim zhing rgyas par bya// lha yi 'jig rten skyong la sogs// gang tshe rtag tu gnas gyur 
74a4(rgyud 'grel): pa// mchod dang mchod bya mnyam ldan par// de tshe lha yang dag gzhug/ nga yis rab tu gnas pa yis// gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yi// ji srid gnas pa de srid du// bsrungs shing khyed kyis legs par skyongs// 
74a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas bzod pa gsol bya ste// gang yang dag blo gti mug pas// legs spyad 'di la nyes gyur gang // 'di kun bya ba gang nyes pa// 'di ni khyed la bzod par gsol// khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun 
74a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs 'tshal te// slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// brjod nas ye shes lha rnams gshegs// dam tshigs bsdus nas shes rab thabs// cho ga gnyis kyis rab bsrungs te// 
74a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon slob ma legs par gnas// dbang bskur rab gnas rdzogs nas su// ston mo dang ni yon yang dbul// skye bo tshi ma zhing rgyas par bya// dmang rigs stong phrag gnyis dag kyang // bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra/ 
74a8(rgyud 'grel): bram ze stong phrags gnyis dang ni// dge slong gcig la rab tu sbyar// dge slong stong phrag gnyis dang ni// rdul med pa ni gcig dang sbyar// rdul med stong phrag gnyis dang ni// ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar// ye shes ldan pa stong/ 
74b1(rgyud 'grel): phrag gnyis// slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par bshad// de nas bla ma dag la yon// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul// gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang // rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // ras ni bzung 'gyur brgya nyid dang / 
74b2(rgyud 'grel): glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang // rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang // mgul rgyan sor gdub dam pa dang // gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs// chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid// bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams// ding nas brtsams te bran du ni// 
74b3(rgyud 'grel): de la bdag ni dbul lags zhes// blo ldan kun nas dang pa yis// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya// de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma// rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur// tshon la sogs pa'i dngos po kun// nang par tho rangs bsdu/ 
74b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// bsdus nas gser gyi bum par ni// bcug nas chu bo chen por dor// bum pa thams cad bsdus nas ni// sngon bzhin du ni dga' stor bya// de nas bdud rtsi lnga sogs ni// sbyar bas sa ni byug par bya// slob dpon chen po lnga 
74b5(rgyud 'grel): yi pa'i// mngon rtogs tshad mar rab gzung ba'i// lam de'i dkyil 'khor cho ga ni// lung la dad pas rab tu blangs// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga mdor bsdus pa// byas pa'i dge ba gang thob pa// 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur 
74b6(rgyud 'grel): cig/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga lag tu blang ba'i rim pa pradz+nyA rak+Shi tas mdzad pa gsal ba rdzogs so// 66// dpal 'khor lo sgom pa'i dbang gi bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs so/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sam+ba ra Na 
74b7(rgyud 'grel): ka kr-i yA kra ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang gi bya ba'i rim pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos po thams cad gcig sdom pa// dpa' bo sdom pa la btud de// rgya che mchog tu gsal ba yi// dbang /

75a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad spangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang par/ cho ga ji lta ba bzhin gnas te/ rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram ras bris pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la 
75a2(rgyud 'grel): nyer spyod lngas mchod de/ mtshan mo'i dus la bum pa rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o// bzhi bcur gcig gis dman pa'i bum pa las ma rnyed na dgu'o// de la gtso bo 'gyur ba'i bum pa la sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la 
75a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i gau ri dang 'phrog byed kyi snying kha'i steng du nyi ma la rdo rje dang rdo rje can bshad pa'i mtshan ma gnyis bri bar bya'o// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / khaN+Da ro hi dang gzugs can ma rnams kyi bum pa bzhi la sna tshogs pad+ma'i 
75a4(rgyud 'grel): ze 'brul gnas pa'i ro'i snying gar nyi ma bzhi la gri gug bzhi'o// rab gtum ma la sogs pa dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi bum pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams la sna tshogs 
75a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i ro'i snying gar nyi ma la so sor gri gug dang rdo rje'o// khwa gdong ma la sogs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas pa rnams kyi bum pa brgyad rnams la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi dbus bu gnas pa'i ro'i snying 
75a6(rgyud 'grel): gar nyi ma la gri gug re re'o// las thams cad pa'i bum pa dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dag gi slar yang so sor// glang po dang / seng ge dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha'i lding rnams kyi steng du gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i 
75a7(rgyud 'grel): snying por yi dgas lnga bris pa'i snying gar zla ba dang nyi ma bzhi la go rim bzhin 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje rnams rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang / don 
75a8(rgyud 'grel): yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o zhes pa rim pa'o// de la gtso bor gyur pa'i bum pa ni ches che ba/ nag po dang rtsa ba med pa/ lto ba 'phyang ba/ mgrin pa mtho ba/ mtshan ma 
75b1(rgyud 'grel): legs par bris pa/ gos bzang pos mgrin pa bkris pa/ tsU ta'i lo ma la sogs pas kha brgyan pa/ gser dang dngul dang / mu men dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dang / nas dang gro dang 'bras dang so ba dang / til dang / ma sha dang / br-i ha ti dang / 
75b2(rgyud 'grel): kaN+Da ka ri/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po dang / dan+tol+lal dkar po dang / sa ha de wa ste/ sman lnga rnams lto bar gzhug go// bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga lhan cig pa'i dri'i chu thod pa'i nang du gnas pa rnams kyis kyang lto ba yang dag par 
75b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhing yongs su gang bar bya'o// hUM lan bdun bzlas pa'i b+ha ru dang lhan cig pa'i skud pa dkar pos de rnams kyi mgrin pa dkri bar bya'o// lA ma la sogs pa rnams kyi bum pa bzhi dang kha gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bum pa 
75b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni/ sgo bzhi'i legs brgyad rnams su go rim bzhin mthar re re'o// ku sha'i stan la dgu po dgod de/ gtso bor gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bum pa lte ba'i steng de nyid du dgod par bya'o// 'di ni bum pa'i rnams kyi grangs su dgu la/ 
75b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de la chog 'di yin te/ slob dpon rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ rang gi snying ga'is bon gyi 'od zer gyi nam mkhar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkug nas/ mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dbul bar 
75b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rtse nas 'kho sa de chags pa chen po'i mes nu bar gyur te/ go rim bzhin rang rang gi bum pa rnams su gzhug go// me tog gi phreng bas nye bar mdzes pa'i rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du bzhag go// oM badz+ra kuN Da li baH 
75b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsngags la las thams cad pa'i bum pa la yang sngags 'di kho na brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs mngon par bsngags par bya'o// gtso bo la sogs pa'i bum pa la yang rnal 'byor ji lta bzhin gtseg 
76a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags kyis so// de nas me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ gtor ma phul nas/ mi bskyod rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa sngon du 'gro 
76a2(rgyud 'grel): bas dril bu dkrol bar bya'o// bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i tshe ga'o// de nas dril bu dang / ak+Sha pI Da dang / pa Ta ha dang / ha tA'i rnam pa dang / pi wang dang gling bu dang / rnga zlum dang / rdza rnga dang / rgod po dang / sgeg pa dang / glu dang / gar dang / 
76a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / zhal zas dang / me long dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid de nyi shu po rnams kyis dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o// de'i rjes su dkyil 'khor par byas pa'i slob ma sngags kyi/ 
76a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyi gal pa dang ldan pa ma tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa pus po'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa napas la// kha cig gsang sngags grub don gnyer// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par byed// de nas gzhan gyi bsod nams 'dod// gzhan dag 
76a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pha rol gnyer// 'jig rten pha rol la dmigs pa'i// dad pa mang du byed pa yi// blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug bya// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod ma bya// tshe 'di 'dod bzhin pa la ni// 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin min// skyes 
76a6(rgyud 'grel): bu ted 'dzin pha rol gnyer// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'bad med nyid// ces slob pa rnams la rjes su bsgrags la// de rnams kyang sems kyis dpal he ru ka'i gzugs rang gi lus la gzhug cing // rdo rje phag mo'i pad+mar gnas pa'i de bzhin 
76a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad zhu ba rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsams nas/ dngos su lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor 'dug ste// 'jug par gsol ba gdab bo// phag mo lhan cig yang dag sbyor// dpal chen khyod bdag ston pa ste// 
76a8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po'i tshul brten pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum bdag la stsal du gsol// mthar/ 
76b1(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par gsol ba gdab bo// de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma gcig gtso bor byas nas// bu tshur shog cig theg chen 
76b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis// mnyam 
76b3(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes yang dag brnyed// sngags kyi rab sbyor mnyam med pa// gang gis shAkya seng+ge sogs// dpa' bo rnams kyis bdud kyi sde// stobs chen drag po chen po bcom// 'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs nas ni// 'khor/ 
76b4(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen theb byed du// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ ces de rnams la brjod nas// dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge

78a1(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa de dag gis slob dpon gyi sdom pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// lhag par dang bas/ bla mas rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa/ che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di// byang chub sems dang dam tshig dang // sdom pa rnams 
78a2(rgyud 'grel): ni yongs 'dzin zhing // gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'dir 'jug 'tshal// zhes pa 'dis bya'o// de nas gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// gsang chen yongs su 'dzin par ni// bdag nyid chen po khyed 'dod dam zhes brjod par bya'o// slob mas/ 
78a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'tshal lo zhes brjod do// de nas rigs lnga la sogs pa'i dam tshig brjod de/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dga' ba'i// sdom pa brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril 
78a4(rgyud 'grel): bu phyag rgya rnams// blo gros chen po khyed kyis gzung // byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes bshad de// slobang pon dag kyang bzung bar bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// sdom pa'i'o// sdom 
78a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dam tshig yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs la de bzhin du// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang bya mas// sbyin pa bzhi ni rab sbyin bya// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis bzung bar bya// 'di 
78a6(rgyud 'grel): wAr pad+ma rigs dgal// sdom pa dam tshig mchog yin no// las kyi rigs chen mthob la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// grogs nyid rdo rje'i spun gyur pa'i// rnal 'byor/ 
78a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bsnyen bkur ni// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// ji ltar nus bzhin kun tu spyad// theg pa spen pa 'dod min zhing // sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor ba yongs su mi spang zhing // rtag tu mya ngan 'das dga' min// lha dang lha min 
78a8(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba la// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o// khyod kyi srog chags bsang mi bya'o// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing // brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// 
78b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can gdul don ma gtogs pa// byab ma yin thams cad spangs// rnal babyor pa rnams bsnyen bkra shing / legs pa rnams la nyer gnas bya// lus kyi las ni nam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa 
78b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnams ni// ji ltar nus bzhin bkang bar bgyi// de ltar bla mas slob mal dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o// slob mas kyang gus pa dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/ gzung bar bya ba'i rim pa 'dis// sangs/ 
78b3(rgyud 'grel): sa thams ca pa thaMg patshal la/ tha~M pa sangs rgyas de yegs pa rnams kyang bdag pa nangs smrams / na nas nas da nas mas / srid kyang chus skyed par 'dugag par du/ drus 
78b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum mgon po rnams/ byang chub tu ninges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla na med// rab mchog bdag gis bskyed par bci// tshul khrims bslabs pa rnam pa gsum// dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don bya'i chu 
78b5(rgyud 'grel): khrims ni// so sar ba tan pa bdag gis gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mtsha ba mchog gsum than med// sangs rgyas rnal 'thor skyes rngom pa// deng nas mchog tu bzung bar bsti// rdo rje rigs mam chen pos/ 
78b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi// dmachog yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re zhing yang drug byas nas// sbyin pa bzhin rab sbyin bgyi/ byang chub chen/ 
78b7(rgyud 'grel): bo las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa'o// bye dang gsang ba zag pa gsum// dam chos so sor gzung bar brtsi// las kyi rigs chen mtho ba la// sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ mchod pa'i las ni tsa nus bzhin// de nyid/ 
78b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni so sor bzung // byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bskyed par bgyis nas ni// sems can kur gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung // ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral// ma grol ba rnams bdag gi das 
79a1(rgyud 'grel): dbugs ma phyung rnams dbugs byung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// oM sarba ta tha ga ta yo ga kA ya bAk+ShIt+ta mut+sa da yi Shu mya she ShA na ba she Sha satwa d+hA tu hi ta su khot+ta ma sid+d+hi a t+yan+na b+ha ba sid+d+hi ma he

79a5(rgyud 'grel): de kho nyid nges 'byung / zhes pa'i bden pas dkyil 'khor ni// gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams// kun gyi sdig med mthong bar shog/ ces pa la sogs pas gsol ba gdab bo// de nas yol ba las/ phyi rol tu yon phul 
79a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i don dadu/ kye dga' ba la dga' lteng su yin zhes dr-i/ des kyang 'di skad du/ bskal bzang ba dag bde ba chen po la'o// zhes brjod do// de nas bla mas slob ma'i snying gang rdo rje bzhag ste/ oM sarba yog 
79a7(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ oM sur te sa ma ya s+t+waM hoHsid+d+hi badz+ra ya thA su khaM/ zhes byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brjod de/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/

79b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis de'i phyir ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur

79b7(rgyud 'grel): gang smra ba de khyod kyis bya'o// khyod kyi nga la brnyas par yang mi bya ste// khyod yang ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes so// dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o// de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin

80a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gu gul chen po dag cha mnyam par lhan cig tu bsres pa chang dang gu gul yang dag par ldan par byas pa'i bdug spos 'dus byas nas/ slob dpon gyis rdo rje phag mo'i sngags bzlas te/ slob ma la bdug spos

82a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis brgyan pa mtho ba'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bla re rgyan pa shar sgor seng ge'i stan la gnas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su dmigs te/ hUM yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje bsgoms nas// thog mtha'/

82b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa rnams kyis 'di kun nas mchod par bya ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par ro// de nas rdo rje can gyis bka' bsgo bar bya ste/ de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mi bya ba ni cung zad med// de nyid shes
82b5(rgyud 'grel): nas de nas ni// dpa' bos 'dod pa lnga spyod cig/ bdag nyid dpa' bo kun rang bzhin// lha mo kun bdag rang nyid do// de phyir bdag gis thams cad bya// bdag nyid he ru ka dpal mchod// brten nas skyes pa'i chos can gyis// sem
82b6(rgyud 'grel): can gzugs brnyan rang bzhin no// khams gsum de ltar shes nas ni// sems can don ni dri med byos// zhes pa dka'i'o// // de nas bya ba byas slob mas// bla ma la ni yon phul te// skye bo dam pa 'dus pa la// bdag nyid kun gyis 
82b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod phyag bya// phyir mi ldog pa'o// slob dpon gyi dbang ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes brjod la// dbang lnga dang slob dpon gyi dbang yang bum pa'i dbang du brjod de/ thams cad du bum pa rnams kyi bya ba yin pa'i phyir/ dbang bskur 
82b8(rgyud 'grel): ba drug po 'di rnams rgyud thams cad du mi 'gal lo// de ltar slob dpon du dbang bskur bas sku rdo rje rnam par sbyangs nas// de'i rjes su yol ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dben par byas pa'i phyogs su slob ma rang gi sems dga' ba 
83a1(rgyud 'grel): ba sbyin par bya'o// de gnyis ka'i dus tshad rdzogs pa dang gsang ba'i de nyid las mthe bong dang ming med dag gis btsir te/ zhes pa des na rdo rje dang pad+ma yis so// slob ma 'od dpag tu med pa'i bdag nyid// a ho shin tu bde 
83a2(rgyud 'grel): chen nyid// bstan la ston pa yang dag brjod// kun rtog bcom pa'i slob ma yis// pad+mar gnas de kun tu spyad// 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis// ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur de bzhin du ni byang chub sems// 
83a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pas bu khyod dbang bskur ro// gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su slob pa dang shes rab ma rnams kyang mig dar bcings te mig gnyis la oM yig gnyis bsam mo// oM rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dang // khyod kyi
83a4(rgyud 'grel): mig ni 'byed par brtson// zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pas phye ste dkyil 'khor bstan nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa nA da las skyes so zhes de kho na nyid bsgrag par bya'o// gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas gsung rdo rje 
83a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// de'i rjes su yan lag lngas slob dpon la phyag byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ ka po ta'i thal mos mdun du 'dug ste sngar 
83a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsol ba gad ba ste/ de'i lag par shes rab ma'i lag pa bzhag nas// dpa' mo dang dpa' bo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du byas te/ rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag nas bla ma rdo rje can 
83a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis brjod par bya ste/ lha mo 'di ni phyag rgya che// mtha' yas bde ba sbyin pa mo// bu yis rnam pa kun tu bzung // mchod pa bla na med pa gyis/ zhes brjod nas sbyin par bya'o// de yang gur kum dang tsan dan gyis byug pa/ dri bzang 
83a8(rgyud 'grel): po'i me tog gi phreng bas nye bar mdzes par/ gos med par rang gi chu skyes gsal bar ston par byed do// de de ma thag tu/ lha mo de dpa' bo'i bul bla na med pa'i bka' bsgo bar byed de/ dpa' bo byang chub sems za bar// khyod ni spro ba yin nam 
83b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa/ dam tshig dang sdom pa'i skal pa can// rigs lnga so sor bcings pa'i me tog dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma/ bla ma la gsang dbang bskur ba'i don du phul te/ de la bdag nyid 'brel pa spangs pa'i 
83b2(rgyud 'grel): dus su/ bla ma la btus nas pus mo btsugs thal mo sbyar te/ 'khor lo'i mdun du bya ba byas// 'khor lo'i spyan ni bla ma che// dpa' bos de nyid la btud nas// de nas gsang don don gnyer bya// skyob pa skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs// 'khor// 
83b3(rgyud 'grel): lo sdom pa bdag skyob mdzod// rgyu med par ni thugs rjes che// mgon med bdag gi mgon mdzod cig/ bdag nyid chen po khyed ji ltar// khyab bdag bdag kyang de ltar mdzod// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis tshogs su ni// bying ba bdag la skyabs
83b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod cig / ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de'i rjes su rim gyis bsgoms sam// skad cig gis bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsgoms te/ slob mas phul ba'i shes rab ma rdo rje phag mo'i rnal 'byor gyis// 
83b5(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa la go cha chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis go bgos nas/ de bzhin du sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab cing kye'i rdo rje las bshad pa/ rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab ste/ hUM yig las rdo rje/ bya yig las nor bu rtse mor b+ha yig ser pos/ 
83b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / A ya~M ga las pad+ma 'dab ma gsum pa b+ha yig las ze'u 'bru dkar po rtse mor d+ha yig ser pos byin gyis brlab cing / ji ltar gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyi tsum pa na'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus 
83b7(rgyud 'grel): sam dkyil 'khor dang nye bar shing dang gos kyi khri la sogs pa'i bde ba'i mal du bzhag ste/ mtshan phyed kyi dus su gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtsam par bya ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje pad+ma 'byed pa la sogs pa'i bya bas 'dzag pa'i gnas
83b8(rgyud 'grel): skabs su/ gdong g.yogs bcings pa'i slob ma'i mgo bo dang / dpral ba dang mig gnyis dang kha dang mgrin pa dang / snying ga ste gnas bdun du snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang / phreng sngags brjod cing rdo rje dang / pad+mas dbang bskur
84a1(rgyud 'grel): ci/ rigs lnga las ni rab byung ba// rigs ma mchod pa la gus sam// rin chen dri chu stobs khrag sogs// da lta za bar yid ches sam// gzhan yang lha yi dam tshig ni// ji ltar 'dod pa smos shig bu zhes so// 
84a2(rgyud 'grel): slob mas 'di skad brjod de/ dam tshig la sogs 'dzin par ni// lha mo bdag ni cis ni spro// bud med rnams la rtag gus dang // pad+ma mchod par cis mi bgyid// de nas lha mo de dga' ste// skra grol gos dang lhan cig tu// rnam par rgyas pa'i pad+ma/ 
84a3(rgyud 'grel): ni// bstan te b+ha dza pad+ma ho// e ma bdag gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan// gang zhig tshogs sten byed pa// de'i mdun na bdag gnas so// sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa// pad+mar bya ba ji bzhin gyis// bde chen rgyal po
84a4(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid dang // 'di nyid du ni rtag tu bzhugs// b+ha dza mok+Sha haMHzhes so// de ma thag tu slob mas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i don du/ dkyil 'khor dang bla ma la btud nas// dkyil 'khor la g.yon skor gyis bskor ba gsum byas/ 
84a5(rgyud 'grel): nye/ slar yang de bzhin nyid du brtsams par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yang rtsom pa 'jug go// bdag nyid dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gzugs kyi sa dang / de yang rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs kyi rdzogs par bya ste go chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi go bgos na/ 
84a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang pad+ma dag ji ltar brjod pa'i sa bon las yongs su gyur par byin gyis brlab pa yang byas nas g.yon ngos su 'jug pa'i rtsa bla mas bstan pa la brten nas sor mo la brten bskul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra sa/ 
84a7(rgyud 'grel): b+hAb+ha ba an+ta ko tsa zhes brjod pas// pad+mal rdo rje bzhag ste shin tu dga' ba'i bstan bcos byed pa'i bya bas bla ma'i mdun du thob pa'i gsang ba'i dbang nyid la yang / shes rab mal 'ji ltar gnas pa bzung ba'i brdas slob mas 
84a8(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ye shes nyams su myong ba yin la/ bla mas kyang brda las slob ma'i bde ba nyams su myong ba nges par rtags so// dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum pa'i/ 
84b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya// zhes brjod cing bskang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de mnyes nas/ bsnyen zags sngags brjod pa mos// mgo bor lag pa g.yon byin nas/ rjes su gnang ba bstan par bya// deng nas 
84b2(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste bu khyod kyis// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// rmil ma bzhin du 'gro kun gyis// den ni bdag nyid kun gyis byas// zhes shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bsrung bas thugs rdo rje rnam par spang bar bya'o// zhes shes rab ye shes 
84b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbang bskung ba'i tshiga'o// rim pa gsum po 'di la mchog man ngagags ni 'dir shes bya/ 'di ni rang nyid gsal ba ste// phyi rol yul ni spangs pa'o// ga 'dobor nas de nas ni/ babs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas 
84b4(rgyud 'grel): med/ brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyod cig pu// zhes pa rig pa'i brtul zhugs so// chu sogs phyir mi sdug pa'i mtha'/ slob dpon dbang du bshad pa ste/ phyi rol bstan pa gang 'di dag thams 
84b5(rgyud 'grel): cad nang du gnas pa'o// kun du spyod pa'i rim dbye las// dpa' bo man dag las shes bya// gang tshe dbang bzhi bstan rnams kyi// brtul zhugs can ni dbang bskur 'gyur// de tshe de nyid ces bya bdi// bsam med chos ni thob phyir ro// gyi dang / 
84b6(rgyud 'grel): nang du yang dag bshad// phyi dang nang gi rang ngo bo// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo ste// bsam gyis mi khyab ces bshad do// snang ba med cing skye ba med// ngag gi lam min gnas med pa// de nyid lnga pa rdzogs pa'i rim// lhan cig skyes pa mi 
84b7(rgyud 'grel): zad pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas sogs// de ni brtan g.yo 'gro bdag nyid// bdag med nyid kyis bdag tu gnas// dpa' bo bde ba chen po rtogs zhes pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag go// de ltar dbang bskur ba mtha' dag yang dag 
84b8(rgyud 'grel): par thob pa'i slob ma bya ba byas pa yang dag par shes pa sems mngon par dang bas bla ma la yon dbul bar bya ste/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs pa'i// yon ni bla ma la dbul bya// stong phrag brgya yi gser dang ni// rin chen 
85a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs dang // gos zung brgya phrag nyid dang ni// glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang // rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang // mgul rgyan dang ni sor gdub mchog/ gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs// rang gi chung ma'am bu mo
85a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / bran dang bran mo sring mo dang // bcas pa'ang bsgrubs nas dbul bar bya// bdag kyang dngos po thams cad kyis// rtag tu bla ma la dbul bya// deng nas tsams te bdag bran du// khyod la bdag gis phul ba lags// de ltar cho ga de
85a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// sgrub pos shin tu nges pa nyid// // yon phul ba'i phan yon gsungs pa/ de nas de ni mnyes byed pa// gang yang mkha' 'gro lA ma nyid// dum skyes ma yang khyad par du// mkha' 'gro ma rnams rnal 'byor yum// sgrub

85b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ma pa// pati chen po slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rje'i nabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sa// / bde ni lo rtsa ba chen po thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston zhabs kyis bka' drin las// brda sprod pa'i tshul la gro'i snang ba cung zad skyes pa 
85b2(rgyud 'grel): shUH'i dge slong d+harmA shrI b+ha dras 'dren pa dam pa de nyid kyi bka' sgribs blangs te/ dpal mar ma mdzad ye shes kyis brlabs pa'i gnas na lu raM phug tu bsgyur ba'o// / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
85b3(rgyud 'grel): sdom ni/ thab khung btsos te ri mo bri/ bud shing brtsegs te lnga yis mchod// dz+wa las me sbar lha bskyed cing // e hi sogs kyis ye shes gzhug/ sar+b+bas yungs kar chu zan gyis// rdul bsal suM b+has bsang ba bya// ar+g+hal 
85b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs bral nas ne/ a b+hi mar gyi sra gzugs gsum// dbul le ta la dang mnyams 'bras/ sar+b+ba dang ni pus dbul// gtso ba gsum las khyad par bas// sarbAs pad sngags kyis ni// zhazan bu ram las sbyar ba sreg/ duR+sha me tig

85b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// dung chos chu yis bsangs nas ni/ lnga yis mchod de zhu bar bsam// dar ni rten dang brten par bcas// dkyil 'khor man ga bzhin tu bsam// bsang ba ar+g+ha la sogs pa// sngar bzhin rnam pa lnga yis mchod// ye shes 
85b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi gsang sngags kyis// yam shing ku sha ma gtogs pa// pur+Na hu ra ti'i mthar thug pa// rdzas rnams snga bzhin bsreg par bya// pur+Na rkang pa brgyad pas so// bsgrub pa'i sbyin sreg 'di ru bsgyur// min na de'i rjes bsdus lhag bsreg 
85b8(rgyud 'grel): de ni yi ge gsum pa'am// rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis so// bsang ba byas te lnga yi mchod// ji bzhin gtor ma btang nas naM// yi ge brgya pas lhag chad bskang // dngos grub bslangs te dge rtsa bsngo// pad ma'i phyag rgya bsdu 
86a1(rgyud 'grel): / bar bya// me lha yang ni gshegs su gsol// bsdus lhag bsregs te me lha yi// snying ga'i ye shes 'khor lo bsar// zhes bya ba ni dpal bde mchog gi sbyin sreg spyi yi ti pa na pad ma dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /

86a3(rgyud 'grel): ma gtang ba ru/ de'i thab khung gi dkyil 'khor du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo// de'i phyi rol du thugs kyi 'khor lo// de'i phyi rol du gsung gi 'khor lo// de'i phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo// de'i phyi rol tu dam tshig gi 'khor lo bris la/ phyag

86a7(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ zhal cig phyag bzhi pa bskyed la/ de'i thugs kar yaM las rlung / raM las me gru gsum pa bsam/ zur gsum la oM AHhUM gsum la/ dbus su lha sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom mo de nas

86b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT/ che ge mo sarba pa paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sar+b+ba big+h+na/ sar+b+ba dz+wa ra/ sar+b+ba gra he/ sar+b+ba u pa dra be/ sar+b+ba duHsan+d+hi/ sar+b+ba dud+hi mi ta/ sar+b+ba akA la mr-i d+ha pra ma na swA hA/ sar+b+ba pu ku la tsit+tad+d+ha ya shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ tshur gshegs tshur

86b7(rgyud 'grel): la bstim par bya'o// de nas yab yum snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu ste/ byang chub sems su gnas pa la/ he ru ka'i snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig gi gis byin gyis brlabs te/ yang sngags de nyid kyis gdab 
86b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// sAts+tsha re de la he ru ka re re bsams la/ de re re las kyang he ru ka mang po spros la de rnams kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par byed par bsam mo// rten 'brel gyi sngags bzlas pas mjug bsdu bar bya'o// 
87a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas grub na mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul/ ma grub na me tog gtor la bskor ba bya'o// mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che// sngags kyis me tog phreng bas brgyan// sha chen rab tu gsol mdzad pa// he ru ka la phyag 
87a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// de nas smon lam gdab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o// bde mchog gi swats+tsha'i lugs rdzogs so// // de nas rab gnas rgyas pa byed na/ gong du bstan pa ltar swats+tsha gang 'grub btab la/ de nas rang lha'i rnal 
87a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor du skad cig mas bsgom/ sAts+tsha de stong pa nyid du bsam/ de las pad+ma'i gdan bsgom/ de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du hUM bsam/ de las 'od 'phros pas sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa sbyangs na/ 
87a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi slar la 'dus pas sbrul tham/ d+hu yang 'od du zhu ba las dpal hUM ru ka yab yum du gsal bar bsgoms la/ rang gi snying ga'i hUM ga 'od kyis ye shes kyis he ru ka yab yum spyan drangs la snyim mo// de nas de la dbang bsku 
87a5(rgyud 'grel): la// spyi bor mi spyod pa bsgom mo// de nas mchod pa dang rgyan rnams dbul lo// he ru ka'i snying po bzlas/ rten 'brel gyi sngags lan gsum bzlas/ de nas smon lam gdab bo// de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngo'o// sAm+b+ha gtsang 
87a6(rgyud 'grel): sar bzhugs su gsol// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dz+wA la saM ba ra swA hA/ oM hriHha ha hUM hUM phaT/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ teSh+Tany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baMg+h+nA d+hI mahA shra ma NaH// // swasna'i cho ga 
87a7(rgyud 'grel): mahA prad+hA rak+Shis tas mdzad pa/ lo tsa ba bshes gnyen pa ris bskur ba rdzogs so/ 9/ nabang pa rnam pa'i byu bas zugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ tsakra saMm+ba ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje drag po la phyas 
87a8(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// sku gsum dri ma gsum spangs pa'i// rdo rje drag po phyag 'tshal te// 'khor lo bde mchog bdag nyid kyi// sgrub thabs yan lag mchog bshad bya// de la dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas lag pa dang rkang pa dang kha la sogs pa dag

87b2(rgyud 'grel): ril po dang tshig pa dang ma tshig pa'i 'jigs par byed pa'i ro la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod chen po rab tu bsams la/ mgul rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / lag rgyan dang / spyi bo'i nor bu dang / thal ba dang mchod phyir 
87b3(rgyud 'grel): thogs dang phyag rgya drug gis rgyan pa'i bdag nyid du dmigs te/ bsrung ba'i don du gte mug la sogs pa'i rab gsum bsam te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i chur ba dag dpal he ru ka yin no zhes smon lam

87b6(rgyud 'grel): nichos thams cad rtog pa dang bral ba'o// zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad gang du yang mi gnas pa'o zhes bya bas yi ge gsum gyi don la lhag par mos te yi ge gsum gyis khams gsum dang bdag nyid ma lus pa snang ba med par byas 
87b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ de ltar byas shing gnas par bsam pa'i rjes su sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis he ru ka zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo'i rang bzhin oM dang AHdang hUM gi yi ge rim pa ji ltabs snying dang bar dang 'og tu rim pa bzhin du nam mkha'i phyogs

91a8(rgyud 'grel): ba bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po don yod rdo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris bskur ba'o// 5// dab 'ad cag da la bar bzhugs/ 6// rgyagar skad du/ shrIHkra saM par maN+Da lo pa yi kAn ma/ khod skad du/

91b2(rgyud 'grel): gas/ dpal ldan pade mchog rgyud du ni// de la bsdus pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ci gsungs dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim// de 'dir rgyas par bshad par bya// gang phyir dbang skur chog ni// gcig tu tshang bar ma bstan gang // gang zhig rgyud gzhan 
91b3(rgyud 'grel): las grags pa// bsdebs nas gcig tu legs bsdus nas// dbang bskur tshe ga'i dgos pa ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// sngags dang tshags bcas gzhan gyis ni// de yang 'dir ni kha bskang bya// de la slob ma gcang 
91b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing brtson// 'dod chags ni sdang rnam spangs shing // slob ma yon tan thams cad ldan// gzhan gyi rag ma sun mi 'dom// slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// de bzhin bstan bcos mang po thos// sngags dang chud kyi cho ga shes// bzod ldan 
91b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid shes par b+ha// ha ru ka dpal dbang bskur gyis// dbang bskur rnal 'byor ched du brtson// ji srid bla ma dgyes par du// de srid bla ma 'bad pas bsten// bu khyod ci bya zhes brjod de// de nas rang ga bsam pa b+hU// mtshad/ 
91b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sprin gyis rab mchod nas// sngags 'di yis ni phyag bya ste// oM sarba ta thA ga tak+Sha ya bA~Mk+tsit+ta pra Na me na badz+ra ban+da naM ka ro mo zhes bya 'am/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ka hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dz+wA la saM ba ra swAhA zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshes 
91b7(rgyud 'grel): pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs// kun tu 
91b8(rgyud 'grel): bzang po sku yi mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba'i// ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun 
92a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i tshigs bcad kyis// bla ma lan gsum gsol ba gdab// gsol
92a2(rgyud 'grel): ba btab pa'i bla ma gang // rang gi sems la 'di bya ste// dpal ldan bde mchog rim gsungs pa'i// cho gas 'gro ba thams cad ni// bdag gis 'bad pas bton nas su// bde ba mchog la dgod bya ste// yang dag bla na med pa
92a3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ byang chub nges par 'dis ster byed// de ltar bstod pa byas nas ni// 'di ltar yang ni brjod par bya// nyon mongs 'dam gyi ma gos pa// srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba yis// de phyir brgal bar ma nus pas// sems can phung
92a4(rgyud 'grel): po shin tu sdug nyan thos la sogs brgal ba dang // rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' dang / dpa' bo rnams kyis bde chen 'thob// dkyil 'khor shes la spro bar gyis// dri ma gsum spangs 'khor lo gsum// bla na med par khyod 'jug 
92a5(rgyud 'grel): gam/ 'di nyid lan gsum brjod par bya// de bzhin slob mas lan gsum mo// 'gro ba gdon pa'i bsam pa yis// spo bas 'di skad du ni brjod// slar yang bla mas slob ma la// 'di skad du ni dri bya ste// khyod kyis yo byas thams cad ni// 
92a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sam lan gsum dri bar bya// slob mas kyang ni brjod bya ba// yo byad phun tshogs cung zhig 'byor// cung zhig kyang ni ma 'byor brjod// gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs bcad ni// sngags pas tshigs bcad nyi shu gcig/ gsol ba btab
92a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bla ma yis// slob ma de ni yongs su bzung // cho ga 'di ni yang dag par// yid ni mnyam par legs par bzhag/ de la thog mar re zhig ni// he ru ka dpal rgyal bdag nyid// rnal 'byor gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'dri// de yi rnal 'byor/ 
92a8(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par bya// de nas he ru ka zhes pa'i// slob ma mnyam par bzhag pa la// ji lta'i rim bzhin yi ge gsum// spyi gtsug mgrin pa snying gar dgod// rgyu med mnyam par nyams don du// gar yang rnam par mi gnas dang // brjod dang 
92b1(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i rang bzhin dang // de bzhin 'di ni rang bzhin med// slob ma rang bzhin med 'di bya// 'og nas brjod pa'i rang bzhin gyis// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor du// slob ma rdzogs par bskyed nas ni// dbang bskur yang dag bsdus 
92b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ yid kyis yongs su brtag pa yin// lha mo bzhi yis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pas bdud rtsis khrus bya'o// pu wi ma la ya la sogs// nyi shu rtsa bzhi sa bon ldan// de yi sa bon mthu yis ni// rab tu gtum mo la sog 
92b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ mdun nas slob mchog goN bya// de nas bsrung ba chen por 'gyur// smigatsug la sogs thams cad du// ji srid pus mo bar mtshams med// de yis sems las byung ba'i bgags// thams cad du ni 'byung mi 'phrul 
92b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar yang dag nyer bskyed bya// slob ma yongs bzung tshigs bcad dgus// de bzhin slob ma yongs su bzung nas// bsnyen pa yang dag brtsams pa ste// dpal ldan he ru ka rnal 'byor// de yi sngags dang rnal 'byor rig/ 
92b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar// rab tu brtag par su yis nus// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// dkyil 'khor dag ni brtags na 'grub// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ni// bdag gis 'di ru bshad bya ste// rnal 'byor can gyis 
92b6(rgyud 'grel): de gnas bstan// ji bzhin gsal brjod par bya// 'bab chu ri bo yid 'ong ba// 'bras bu rtsa ba bcas pa dang // me tog sna tshogs bkram pa yi// rgyun tu shing gi grib ma la// grong khyer las ring nye ba min// skye 'gro yid mthun skye 
92b7(rgyud 'grel): bo spangs/ gal te med na chu bo'i 'gram// nye bar sdong po yal 'dab ldan// gal te sa phyogs med na ni// rgyal po gang du 'dod par ro// grong khyer dag gi sa phyogs sam// gang du bstan pa'i sa phyogs su// yid du 'ong bar 
92b8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag spyod// phyag dar byug pa la sogs kyis// 'bad de rdzogs par byas nas ni// dri dang me tog sna tshogs sogs// yang dag mchod la gtor ma brtsams// de nas 'jam pa'i stan la ni// yang dag gnas te bdud rtsi lnga// 
93a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi ngos su bzhag nas ni// brtul zhugs can gyis ri lu bza'// slob dpon yang dag rgyud shes shing // sngags dang phyag rgya'i pha rol son// phyi rol yan lag blangs nas ni// de dag lhan cig rnal 'byor bya// 
93a2(rgyud 'grel): de la 'di yis rim shes pas// phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i lus// thal ba spangs pa'i lhag ma yis// rig ma yang dag brgyan par bya// sems can kun la phan don phyir// bde ba'i rgyu ru bdag nyid med// he ru ka dpal nyid 
93a3(rgyud 'grel): no// sngon du sngon lam lan gsum brjod// kha sbyor rnal 'byor bsgom byas nas// dur khrod chen po brtsams par bya// ro ni tshig dang ma tshig dang // ce spyang bkra mi shes pa'i sgra// khwa dang 'ug pa bya rog dang // sdong po khung bu 
93a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrul dang ni// 'di ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// dang por byas te de ma thag// 'og nas 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor che// hUM zhes skad cig gis dmigs la// A li kA li lan gsum brjod// rab lan gsum dgod pa ni// 
93a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyi ga yi ni spyi gtsug dang // mgrin pa'i snying gdag du dgod// sngon bzhin 'gro kun snang med par// de bzhin du ni bdag nyid bya// smon lam dbang gis nam mkha' la// langs te sems kyi mtshan nyid ni// oM aHhUM gaM yi ge 
93a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ ji lta ba yi rim pa bzhin// steng 'og bar du rnam par bsam// de nas hUM yig gyur pa las// rje lnga pa yi rdo rje ste// de yi lte ba'i dkyil gnas pa// yang na hUM gi yi ge bawA// hUM las 'od zer 'phros nas ni// A yig/ 
93a7(rgyud 'grel): la ni zhugs par bsam// de bzhin AHlas byung nas ni// oM yig la ni legs par zhugs// oM las 'od zer 'phros nas ni// oM AHhUM gi yi ge gsum// ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par// de sred yi ge gnas 'dra/ 
93a8(rgyud 'grel): ba/ sems can thams cad rnams dag don// de lta spro bar 'dod pa yin// rtsa ba'i yi ge gsum po las// 'od zer lcags kyu rnam par spros// slar ni yang dag bkug nas su// yi ge gsum la legs par bsdu// phyi nas de 
93b1(rgyud 'grel): yi oM yig ni// AHyig la ni gzhug par bya// de bzhin A yig rdo rje la// rdo rje yang ni hUM la gzhug/ mgo bo zla phyed thig le sgra// sgra yang de bzhin rim shes bya// sgra tsam du ni zhugs bya la// de yang nye bar dmigs mi bya// de ltar byas rba 
93b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas ni// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyang bya// ya ral wa'i rang bzhin la// rlung dang me dang sa dang chu// de lteng rus sbal thod pa 'am// ji ltar 'dod par brtag par bya// der ni a yi rang bzhin la// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya// de snyed
93b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de'i steng du ri rab bsgom// de bzhin du yang 'dab ma brgyad// ze 'bru dkar po bcas pa yi// grags pa'i rang bzhin sa bon ni// gong nas gong du bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ni// nges par 'dir yang 
93b4(rgyud 'grel): brtag bya ste// dang por kha dog nag po'o// gnyis pa de bzhin ljang gu ste// gsum pa'i rnam pa dmar po'o// bzhi pa ser po rnam pa ste// mtshams kyi 'dab ma 'dres pa'o// rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi// ri yi rgyal po zur bzhi 
93b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ri bdun ri yis yongs bskor ba'i// ze 'bru A li kA li dgod// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de bzhin sangs rgyas zhing du gnas// 'di ltar yongs su grags pa yin// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste// 'khor lo gsum 
93b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bdag nyid bcas// gzhan du rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir// 'bad de legs par gsungs pa yin// nA da tsam las byung ba yi// de bzhin du ni thig le'o// thig le las ni zla phyed byas// zla phyed las ni de bzhin mgo/ mgo bo la ni haM yig go// 
93b7(rgyud 'grel): haM las u ni byung ba ste// de ltar hUM yig rdzogs nas ni// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan steng du bsgom// hUM gi yi ge gcig nyid las// bde mchog dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// gzhal yas khang pa'i mthar thug par// ci gsungs skad cig de la
93b8(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ sa gzhir 'bras kyi sa bon bzhin// 'dir ni phyir 'byin rim pa med// dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma// rang bdag dus gcig bskyed pa ste// dpa' bo dbang phyug ze 'bru la// de yi kha dog phyag sogs rim// bla ma'i man ngag 
94a1(rgyud 'grel): / bsrungs pa ni// rgyas pa ru ni bshad par bya// rtsa zhal rang lus thams cad ni// du ba'i mdog can 'od 'phro ba'i// spyi bo g.yon phyogs zla phyed dang // ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan 
94a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyad can// dbus su dpa' mo lha dbang phyug/ g.yon du mkha' 'gro lA ma'o// g.yas ni dum skyes gzugs can ma'o// de 'og rdo rje phreng ba dang // thams cad du ni spyan gsum pa// g.yon gyi zhal ni ljang gu ste// 
94a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyab ni shin tu dmar ba'o// g.yas kyis zhal ni ser ba ste// de ltar zhal gyi rim pa'o// sku la phyag rgya drug gis brgyadan// zhe sdang thams cad spangs pa yis// mgul rgyan dang ni lag gdub dang // spyi gtsug nor bu rna cha dang // thal
94a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ni mchod phyir thogs// de rnams phyag rgya drug tu grags// A li kA li rnam dag pa'i// thod pa'i phreng ba 'phyar ba ste// stag gi spags pa'i sham thabs gang // dngos su de dang ldan pa'o// dang po phyag ni gnyis dag gri/ 
94a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu gnyis bzung nas// lha mo legs 'khyud 'o byed pa'o// gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa'i gos// de yi rgyab nas khrag 'dzag cing // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin du bskor// g.yon gyi phyag ni gsum pa na// 
94a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshar rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bzhi pa na ni thod pa ste// nA ma sha khrig bcas pa'o// lnga pa na ni zhags pa ste// drug pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo'o// g.yas kyi phyag ni gsum pa na// rtse gsum bgegs ni 'joms pa'o// bzhi pa na ni dgra sta ste// lA pa na ni ra 
94a7(rgyud 'grel): langs so// drug pa mi bzang rje chung sgra// phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod// rus pa yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma'i ze 'bru gnas pa yi// lha mo thod pa'i phyag gis ni// khrag gis bkang nas mgul nas 'khyud// dus gcig du ni phan tshun
94a8(rgyud 'grel): mthung / gang phyir zhal ni gcig phyir ro// g.yas pas rdo rje bsnams nas ni// steng du rab tu brkyang ba nyid// de ltar lha mo phyag gnyis ma// skra grol 'od kyi tshogs dang ldan// thal ba spangs pa'i phyag rgya ni// lhag ma yi ni tshogs kyis brgyan// 
94b1(rgyud 'grel): mi yi rus pa'i ska rags mdzes// spyan gsum nam mkha'i gos can no// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs dang ldan// gzhan ni g.yon ni brkyang ba'i zhabs// 'jigs byed yang dag mnan pa yis// gnyis ni legs par bsgom par bya// 
94b2(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro mo// g.yon par lA ma ru ni grags// rgyab tu dum skyes ma yin te// g.yas su gzugs can ma ru grags// pad 'dab de dang de mdoga'o// lha mo bzhi ru grags pa yi// mtshams kyi pad+mar thod pa rnam// 
94b3(rgyud 'grel): dri chen dri chu khu khrag go// pad+ma'i phyi rol 'khor lo gsum// snying por yongs su brtags pa yin// rtsibs ni brgyad brgyad 'khor la ni// de ni 'phar ma sum rtseg go// dpa' bo mgon po zhabs nas ni// rked pa'i bar du gnas pa ste/ 
94b4(rgyud 'grel): sku'i 'khor lo 'di brjod pa/ stobs po che la sogs brgyad do// rked pa'i phyogs nas brtsam nas ni// nu ma gnyis par yang dag gnas// gsung gi 'khor lo ji lta bar// myu gu can la sogs brgyad do// nu ma nas ni brtsams nas su// 
94b5(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa'i bar du gnas pa ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta bar// thod pa'i dum bu sogs brgyad do// rkeng rus che la sogs zhes pa// de rnams ming gis g.yon zhes bya// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang // thams cad phyag bzhi pa nyid do// thog/ 
94b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yi ni phyag nyid kyi// dpa' bo dbang phyug bzhin du gnas// g.yon pa'i phyag na thod pa ste// g.yas na de bzhin rje chung ngo // dpa' bo zhabs ni g.yas brkyang ba// bud med zhabs ni g.yon brkyang ba'o// dpa' mo rnams dang mkha' 'gro
94b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ sngags dang phyag brgya sngon bzhin no// nag po dmar po de bzhin ser// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// dang po'i sgor ni khwa gdong ma// g.yon du 'ug pa'i gdong ma ste// nub tu khyi gdong mar shes bya// lho ru phag gi 
94b8(rgyud 'grel): gdong ma ste/ lhag ma gshin rje brtan ma dang // gshin rje pho nya de las gzhan// gshin rje che ba nyid dang ni// gzhan yang gshin rje 'joms ma ste// lha mo de ltar mtshams rnams su// lha mo bzhi ru grags pa yin// gtso bo yi ni/ 
95a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyi gdong // sgo skyor bzhi yang de mdog go// mtshams bzhi yi ni lha mo rnams// mdog gnyis nye ba'i rim pas so// sum cu rtsa drug lha mo rnams// g.yon gyi phyag na thod pa'o// g.yas na gri gug shes bya ste/ 
95a2(rgyud 'grel): gcer busma ni grol ba'o// ma lus yang dag brjod pa ni// thams cad 'di bzhin bsgom par bya// 'khor lo gsum po nang byas nas// gzhal yas khar bar bsgom par bya// dri dang me tog de bzhin spos// bzang po'i lha ba shos byug pa 
95a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / bzang po'i mar ma phreng ba dang // bza' dang ston mo bye brag dang // sgron ma dang ni bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs pa yi btung ba dang // gling bu pi wa rnga phran sogs// rnam pa sna tshogs glu yi sgra// gar ma sgeg mo sogs mchod kyis// 
95a4(rgyud 'grel): shin du mnyam gzhag mchod byed cing // rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dra ba dra phyed pas brgyan// dril bu dar dpyangasaM ba dan sogs// rnga yab me tog phreng bas brgyan// dur khrod rnams ni thams cad du// sngar gsungs de yis/ 
95a5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ra// bsrung ba'i don dbye rol du// rab gsum gyis bskor ba ste// rdo rje pad+mar 'khor ba ni// rab zhes ni grags pa'o// gzhal yas khang gi mtha' yi bar// mkhas pas de ltar shes par bya// sna chags thams cad rdzogs 
95a6(rgyud 'grel): bar ni/ dus gcig tu ni bsgom par bya// bye brag mang po spyod pa yaM// yang dag brtan zhing bsgom par bya// de nas gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni// mkhas pas bgegs ni bstA byA ste/ tshig nang dag ni bzhi pod// zhal bzhinas 
95a7(rgyud 'grel): ni brjod par bya// mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo bzhi// thugs kyi 'khor sogs 'khor lo can// khwa gdong la sogs pho nya brgyad// so so'i ming ni brjod par bya// de nas srung ba'i cho ga'i phyir// 'di ltar lus kyi go cha bya// oM ha zhes 
95a8(rgyud 'grel): bya rdzogs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa' snying gar gnas// na ma hi las mgo bo la// rnam par snang mdzad gnas pa'o// swA hA hu las spyi gtsugs phyogs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go// bo Sha Ta he las phrag gnyis su// he ru ka dpal 
95b1(rgyud 'grel): dag tu grags// hUM hUM ho las mig gnyis su// de bzhin rdo rje nyi ma yang // phaT haM ni lus kun la dgod// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// rta mchog mtshon cha'i gzugs can ni// lus kun la ni rnam par gnas// oM baM rdo rje pag 
95b2(rgyud 'grel): mo ni/ lha mo'i lte bar gnas pa'o// haM yaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ni// gshin rje ma ni snying gar gnas// de bzhin hri mo zhes bya ni// rmo ngas byed ma ni kha la gnas// hrih+ni zhes bya mgo bo la// skyod byed ma ni rnams gnas pa'o// hUM hUM 
95b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya skye gtsugs dbus// rnal 'byor ma ni skrag byed gnas// yi ge phaT phaT zhes bya bas// ma lus lus kun gtum mo yis// mtshon cha yi ni rang bzhin no// de ltar yan lag drug dgod pa// gnyis la yang ni byas par bas mo// 
95b4(rgyud 'grel): thal mo phye ba'i thod pa yis// mkhas pas mchod yon lan gsum sbyin// ye shes 'khor lo gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag brtsam// ji ltar 'khor lo 'dir bstan pa// de yang de bzhin gnas pa nyid// hUM yig snying 
95b5(rgyud 'grel): gar bsam bya ste// de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis// dpa' bo kun du gnas pa yi// ye shes 'khor lo yang dag bskul// rkang pa yang dag brkyang bya ste// g.yas pa yi ni mtheb chen gyis// g.yon pa yi ni mtheb chen mnan// 
95b6(rgyud 'grel): pho nya'i phyag rgya lhag ma ste// mthe'u chung gis ni sor mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje thal mo brkyad// mtheb mo sngon du kha sbyar nas// mtheb rtse pog tu blta bar bya// mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun du// lcags sgrogs lta bur bcing ba nyid// dpral 
95b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng du yang dag bzhag/ pho na lan gnyis brjod pa yis// rkang pa g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// g.yon dang g.yas su de bzhin no// rang gi 'khor lo lta bu blta// 'khor lo 'khor lor gzhug par bya// de nas lha mo'i gnas bzhi ni/ 
95b8(rgyud 'grel): ba snying ga de bzhin du// kha yi phyogs dang dpral ba ru// phyag rgya bzhini yang dag bkod// de la sngags ni 'di yin no// oM sarba bud+d+hA n+da kaM nI ye badz+ra brta nI ye swAt+ma/ oM badz+ra ba ro tsa nA ya swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM shrI badz+ra \u0f7f
96a1(rgyud 'grel): ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT phaT/ DA ki ni dz+wA la saM ba raM swA hA/ de nas thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// phyi rol mtshams kyi rab ni// nam mkha' yi ni khongs nyid du// rdo rje gur ni bsgoms par bya// de ltar yongs su rdzogs byas 
96a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rdo rje pad+ma bsgom par bya// bya las byung ba'i rdo rje bsam// de bzhin pad+ma d+ha las so// de nas ar+g+ha byin nas ni// dril bu 'bad pas dkrol bar bya// phyi dang gsang ba la sogs pa'i// sgeg mo la sogs yang dag mchod// e ma'i/ 
96a3(rgyud 'grel): chos e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos don yang dag 'byung // chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni legs dag pa// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// 'gyur ba med cing snang ba 
96a4(rgyud 'grel): med/ rdo rje'i skul phyag 'tshal 'dud// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gtso// dus gsum lam gyi lam la gnas// nam mkha' chen po dbyings byung ba// nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha' sku ni yang dag 
96a5(rgyud 'grel): byung / nam mkha' gsung ni rab 'jug byed// nam mkha' thugs ni chos kyis mchog/ spyod pa'i go 'phang phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che// nam mkha' spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po mchod
